translation.en: I'm making this movie because, uh...
translation.zh: 我拍这部影片的原因是…

translation.en: Which way you want me to look?
translation.zh: 我应该朝向哪边？

translation.en: -[producer] Right here. -Okay.
translation.zh: -朝这里 -好的

translation.en: I'm basically making this movie
translation.zh: 基本上 我拍这部影片的原因是

translation.en: because I have 25 years
translation.zh: 基本上 我拍这部影片的原因是 我有我和卡通先生 25年来的影像和照片

translation.en: of footage and photos of me and Cartoon's...
translation.zh: 我有我和卡通先生 25年来的影像和照片

translation.en: I guess, uh, journey in life,
translation.zh: 可以说记录了我们的生命历程

translation.en: and all the movement that we've...
translation.zh: 以及我们引发的艺术运动…

translation.en: Wait, let me see.
translation.zh: 等等 我想一下

translation.en: If you ain't got tatted by Cartoon, you ain't got no tat.
translation.zh: 不是卡通先生刺的纹身就不算纹身

translation.en: If you ain't get shot by Estevan, you got a weak photographer.
translation.zh: 除埃斯特万之外的摄影师不够给力

translation.en: You can't tell the story of Estevan without telling the story of Cartoon.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万和卡通先生的故事紧密相连

translation.en: You know Toons, then you know Estev.
translation.zh: 认识卡通先生就会认识埃斯特万

translation.en: They are LA.
translation.zh: 他们就是洛杉矶的象征

translation.en: Premier representatives of that Los Angeles culture.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶文化的标志性代表人物

translation.en: Like, the pioneers.
translation.zh: 他们是先锋人物

translation.en: Not just pioneers, I mean, I think they're historians.
translation.zh: 不仅是先锋人物 还是历史的叙述者

translation.en: Storytellers, they're the image-makers. The chroniclers.
translation.zh: 故事的讲述者 他们用影像记录时代

translation.en: When you say LA tattoo artists, you can't not mention Mister Cartoon.
translation.zh: 说起洛城纹身师 不得不提卡通先生

translation.en: Nobody does art like Cartoon.
translation.zh: 卡通先生的艺术风格独一无二

translation.en: When you look at a Mister Cartoon tattoo, you know that's Mister Cartoon.
translation.zh: 由卡通先生刺的纹身 你一看便知

translation.en: Everybody knows Mister Cartoon.
translation.zh: 卡通先生人尽皆知

translation.en: The hip-hop tattoo artist.
translation.zh: 首屈一指的嘻哈纹身师

translation.en: Man, you got tatted by Toons, it's, like, a level of respect.
translation.zh: 我靠 让卡通先生刺纹身是很牛的

translation.en: Cartoon, baby.
translation.zh: 好耶 卡通先生

translation.en: -My boy Cartoon. -Cartoon.
translation.zh: -我的哥们儿卡通先生 -卡通先生

translation.en: The world-famous Cartoon.
translation.zh: 世界闻名的卡通先生

translation.en: Everything Cartoon did, Estevan was there.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万记录了卡通先生的一举一动

translation.en: Estevan brings an authenticity that is matched by none other.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万所营造的真实感无人能敌

translation.en: Photographing gang members.
translation.zh: 给黑帮分子拍照

translation.en: Capturing the whole culture and everything, man.
translation.zh: 捕捉整个文化及一切事物

translation.en: Lowrider culture, tattoo culture, shots of Skid Row.
translation.zh: 趴地跳跳车文化 纹身文化 拍摄洛城贫民窟的实况

translation.en: [Wilmer] Leaving pieces of history behind.
translation.zh: 记录了历史的点点滴滴

translation.en: -[George] These vatos... -[Snoop] They showed
translation.zh: 他们证明了只要你做好每一步

translation.en: that you can do it the right way if you do it the right way.
translation.zh: 他们证明了只要你做好每一步 就一定能成功

translation.en: [George] They take pride in all of that.
translation.zh: 他们对这一切引以为豪

translation.en: [Snoop] They paved the way for a lot of people.
translation.zh: 他们为很多人铺平了道路

translation.en: Even if they don't admit it.
translation.zh: 即使他们并不承认

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without these two guys.
translation.zh: 没有他们俩 就没有我们的成就

translation.en: It's about courage.
translation.zh: 最关键的是勇气 忠于自己

translation.en: Just be true to who you are, and a lot of people are terrified
translation.zh: 最关键的是勇气 忠于自己 很多人都很惧怕做真实的自我

translation.en: of being who they are.
translation.zh: 很多人都很惧怕做真实的自我

translation.en: That's one of the reasons they're so successful.
translation.zh: 这就是他们如此成功的原因之一

translation.en: They mean what they say and they say what they mean.
translation.zh: 他们心直口快 言出必行

translation.en: This is our thing, and we wanna bring this out to the world.
translation.zh: 这是我们的文化 我们想向世界展示

translation.en: LA's globalized.
translation.zh: 让洛杉矶走向世界

translation.en: They've joined forces, and they've been unstoppable ever since.
translation.zh: 他们强强联合 从此一往无前

translation.en: [Cartoon] Coming from a Chicano, Mexican family,
translation.zh: 我生长在一个墨裔美国人家庭

translation.en: believing in God is standard issue.
translation.zh: 对主的信仰是顺理成章的

translation.en: I was formerly raised Catholic.
translation.zh: 我是不折不扣的天主教徒

translation.en: I was told at a young age that I was gifted, I was blessed,
translation.zh: 我从小就听人说我有天赋 我受到了福赐

translation.en: I have a gift from God.
translation.zh: 上帝让我天赋异禀

translation.en: And when you tell a kid that every day over and over and over,
translation.zh: 一个孩子如果每天都反复听到这种话

translation.en: they start to believe it.
translation.zh: 他会开始信以为真

translation.en: So when my mom would ask me to clean the room,
translation.zh: 所以当我妈妈让我清扫房间和铺床时

translation.en: make my bed, I'd be like,
translation.zh: 所以当我妈妈让我清扫房间和铺床时 （卡通先生 纹身师）

translation.en: "I've been gifted from God. I'm not gonna make my bed. Come on."
translation.zh: 我会说：“我是天赋之才 我才不铺床呢 你可别搞错了”

translation.en: [Estevan] For me, work is happiness. Yeah, I love to work.
translation.zh: 对我来说 工作是一件幸事 我爱工作

translation.en: I love doing photography. I love filming.
translation.zh: 我爱摄影 我爱拍摄

translation.en: You know, when you say "work," that means you do something
translation.zh: 既然是工作 那就说明你付出劳动并获得报酬

translation.en: and you get paid, so, yeah, that means my bills can get paid,
translation.zh: 那就说明你付出劳动并获得报酬 所以这份工作让我可以养家糊口

translation.en: and I can keep moving forward.
translation.zh: 可以一直不断前进

translation.en: -[girl] Daddy! -[Estevan] I'm not the best dad or the best husband,
translation.zh: 我不是最棒的爸爸或最好的丈夫

translation.en: but I think I'm a good worker,
translation.zh: 但我自认为是个好的工作者

translation.en: a good photographer,
translation.zh: 好的摄影师

translation.en: and a pretty good friend.
translation.zh: 也是个挺不错的朋友

translation.en: Nobody could say I'd done them wrong. If they do, they're a lying motherfucker.
translation.zh: 没有人会说我对他们不义 要是有人这么说 那就是他妈的撒谎

translation.en: [Cartoon] If you focus,
translation.zh: 只要专注 就能发现牛逼的事物

translation.en: you could see shit off of your talent.
translation.zh: 只要专注 就能发现牛逼的事物 贡献你的才华

translation.en: You could travel the world.
translation.zh: 你能环游世界 去欧洲等牛逼地方

translation.en: You could go to Europe and shit. Like, we've been all around the world.
translation.zh: 你能环游世界 去欧洲等牛逼地方 我们的足迹遍布全球

translation.en: You can buy a home for your family.
translation.zh: 你可以给家人买座房子 （文化）

translation.en: [Estevan] Art was like I had to scratch an itch.
translation.zh: 艺术是让我心痒痒的东西

translation.en: I would see shit, I would see a movie poster,
translation.zh: 我会看到一个牛逼的东西 比如电影海报

translation.en: or I would see something that made me wanna draw,
translation.zh: 或者是让我有绘画欲望的东西

translation.en: and I would get this kind of anxiety that I had to draw,
translation.zh: 我会有一种急迫感 感觉非画不可 一定要每天都画

translation.en: I had to draw every day. To let it go.
translation.zh: 感觉非画不可 一定要每天都画 这样才能释放

translation.en: [Yolanda] He was young, very young, like... four.
translation.zh: 那时他年纪还小 非常小 也就四岁的样子

translation.en: At that time, he was drawing nostrils, fingernails, earlobes,
translation.zh: 那时他就会画鼻孔、手指甲、耳垂

translation.en: you know, things that kids drew with stick figures,
translation.zh: 一般孩子用线条一笔带过的东西

translation.en: he was drawing, doing very intricate things.
translation.zh: 他却会画得非常细致 （卡通先生的父母）

translation.en: He was my first child, so I just thought I was the greatest mom
translation.zh: 他是我的第一个孩子 让我觉得自己是最棒的妈妈

translation.en: because he was so good, you know?
translation.zh: 因为他真是太棒了 你知道吗？

translation.en: [David] His mom was, "You're the best.
translation.zh: 他妈妈总说：“你是最棒的

translation.en: You're amazing. You're the best artist in the world.
translation.zh: 你太厉害了 你是世上最棒的艺术家

translation.en: You're gonna grow up to be wonderful."
translation.zh: 你长大之后会成大器”

translation.en: And then, at some point, you just believe it.
translation.zh: 你会渐渐开始信以为真 （大卫崔 艺术家）

translation.en: When I was a kid, my father met this guy at the line at the bank.
translation.zh: 在我小时候 我爸在银行排队时遇见一个男人

translation.en: He says, "I'm in karate. I have a business, a karate business."
translation.zh: 他说：“我是搞空手道的 我是做空手道培训生意的”

translation.en: My dad comes home and he goes,
translation.zh: 我爸回家后说：“我有好消息

translation.en: "I got great news. You're going to martial arts school."
translation.zh: 我爸回家后说：“我有好消息 你去上武术学校吧”

translation.en: I go, "I don't wanna do that." He goes, "Yeah."
translation.zh: 我说：“我不想去” 他说：“你要去”

translation.en: Hey, I'm paying for that...
translation.zh: 钱是我出的

translation.en: [chuckling] ...you're gonna go.
translation.zh: 你一定要去

translation.en: When he first started, he was real shy, wouldn't talk to anybody.
translation.zh: 一开始的时候 他特别害羞 也不跟人说话

translation.en: But maybe about a year after karate,
translation.zh: 但是在练了大概一年的空手道之后

translation.en: I would say that he was so confident that he'd walk straight up.
translation.zh: 可以说他变得非常自信 能径直走上去和人交谈

translation.en: Going to the karate school introduced me
translation.zh: 上空手道学校的经历 让我第一次接触到了糖果漆

translation.en: to the world of candy paint
translation.zh: 让我第一次接触到了糖果漆

translation.en: because the grand master of the school was also a custom car painter,
translation.zh: 因为学校的校长也做定制汽车烤漆

translation.en: so I learned all those things, you know, the murals, the candy paint,
translation.zh: 所以我学到了各种相关知识 比如车身彩绘、糖果漆

translation.en: respect, the flow of life.
translation.zh: 以及跟着人生固有的节奏走

translation.en: All these things kind of went in a circle.
translation.zh: 这一切都相辅相成

translation.en: It's crazy.
translation.zh: 真是不可思议

translation.en: I'm Estevan Oriol. I'm a photographer and director.
translation.zh: 我叫埃斯特万奥里奥尔 我是生长在洛杉矶的摄影师兼导演

translation.en: Raised in LA.
translation.zh: 我是生长在洛杉矶的摄影师兼导演

translation.en: I was born in Santa Monica at Saint John's Hospital.
translation.zh: 我出生于圣莫尼卡的圣约翰医院

translation.en: [David] So you got Estevan.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万嘛

translation.en: Like, this tall cholo guy,
translation.zh: 个子很高 一副墨裔匪帮街头风的打扮

translation.en: but then most people don't know he's half Italian.
translation.zh: 但大多数人都不知道 他有一半的意大利血统

translation.en: [Estevan] My mom and dad were married up until I was about three.
translation.zh: 我爸妈在我三岁左右的时候离婚了

translation.en: And they split up, and it was me and my mom.
translation.zh: 他们分开之后 就只剩我和我妈妈了

translation.en: To me, my mom was great.
translation.zh: 我觉得我妈妈很棒

translation.en: We grew up on welfare, food stamps and Medi-Cal,
translation.zh: 我们靠福利、食品券和医保资助度日

translation.en: but she did her best to make it the best for me.
translation.zh: 但她拼尽全力让我过上最好的生活

translation.en: Any time you have mixed-race children,
translation.zh: 混血小孩有一个共性

translation.en: they grow up a little bit confused though, "Am I this race or am I this race?"
translation.zh: 他们在成长过程中会有一些困惑 “我属于这个种族还是那个种族？”

translation.en: And at some point, you just gotta choose. He chose the Latino side.
translation.zh: 总有一天你要做出选择 他选择了拉丁裔的这一边

translation.en: I didn't even know it until years later.
translation.zh: 这是我很多年后才知道的

translation.en: [Estevan] My dad, he was kind of like a hippie.
translation.zh: 我爸爸有一点嬉皮士的感觉

translation.en: He didn't give a shit about having a nice car and all that shit,
translation.zh: 他才不他妈在乎开好车这种事

translation.en: so that pushed me to strive for more.
translation.zh: 他的态度让我想要为更好的生活拼搏

translation.en: That's what gave me my drive.
translation.zh: 这就是我的驱动力

translation.en: So after high school, I worked at a snack bar,
translation.zh: 高中毕业之后 我在小吃店

translation.en: I worked on fishing boats,
translation.zh: 渔船上

translation.en: supermarkets,
translation.zh: 超市里做过工

translation.en: liquor store delivery.
translation.zh: 还给酒品专卖店送过货

translation.en: I always had, like, one, two, three jobs.
translation.zh: 我总是在做工 甚至同时兼两三份差

translation.en: [Cartoon] At the time, in the '80s,
translation.zh: 1980年代的核心问题是

translation.en: it was all about where do you fit in
translation.zh: 1980年代的核心问题是 你在嘻哈文化里扮演哪个角色

translation.en: in hip-hop.
translation.zh: 你在嘻哈文化里扮演哪个角色

translation.en: Are you a breaker? Are you a rapper?
translation.zh: 你是跳霹雳舞 还是说唱？

translation.en: Are you a locker? Are you a writer?
translation.zh: 你是跳锁舞还是创作涂鸦？

translation.en: And I was like, "I love breakdancing,
translation.zh: 对我而言 我喜欢霹雳舞这些玩意儿

translation.en: and all that shit," but I couldn't hang.
translation.zh: 对我而言 我喜欢霹雳舞这些玩意儿 可我走不长远 我擅长的是画画

translation.en: But I could draw.
translation.zh: 可我走不长远 我擅长的是画画

translation.en: [Angel] Cartoon, uh, always had a marker
translation.zh: 卡通先生总是随身带着马克笔

translation.en: or a can of spray paint with him all the time.
translation.zh: 或者一罐喷漆 （儿时好友）

translation.en: And wherever we were at, he'd hit up.
translation.zh: 不管我们在哪儿 他都会涂鸦

translation.en: [Cartoon] 'Cause I was hip-hop. I had a b-boy side of me.
translation.zh: 因为我拥抱嘻哈文化 我有嘻哈少年的一面

translation.en: It was, like, bombing, 3-Ds, fade.
translation.zh: 比如炸街 三维涂鸦 多色混合涂鸦

translation.en: [Revok] You know, before the Cartoon that he's known for today,
translation.zh: 其实在他成为纹身大师卡通先生之前

translation.en: he was an awesome graffiti writer.
translation.zh: 他是一位杰出的涂鸦创作者

translation.en: He was from this crew WCA that was kind of legendary
translation.zh: 他曾是WCA团队的一员 他们挺传奇的 真他妈特别厉害

translation.en: and was really fucking good.
translation.zh: 他们挺传奇的 真他妈特别厉害

translation.en: [Risk] I go to probably late '80s with Cartoon.
translation.zh: 我是在80年代末认识卡通先生的

translation.en: He was "Flame" at the time.
translation.zh: 当时他名叫“火焰”

translation.en: I thought I knew everybody. I was like, "Who the fuck is this?"
translation.zh: 我以为我谁都认识 当时心想：“这他妈谁啊？”

translation.en: And he had such a unique style, and was so different.
translation.zh: 而且他的风格非常独特 很不一样

translation.en: He hit and run. Like, I'd see a wall, and next day I was like,
translation.zh: 他动作很快 我刚发现一面墙 第二天就会发问： “这涂鸦是从哪儿来的？谁做的？”

translation.en: "Where did this come from? Who did it?" You know.
translation.zh: 第二天就会发问： “这涂鸦是从哪儿来的？谁做的？”

translation.en: [Cartoon] I basically do graffiti everywhere I go.
translation.zh: 基本上我所到之处都会画涂鸦

translation.en: It brought me a rush, like, you can go to jail for this shit.
translation.zh: 这给我一种快感 毕竟干这玩意儿是可能坐牢的

translation.en: [Yolanda] He put his name, "Flame," on the graffiti piece,
translation.zh: 他在涂鸦上留下了他的名字“火焰” （马克马查多 又名火焰）

translation.en: and, so, he was caught, you know, for doing that.
translation.zh: 大家都熟知了他的操作模式

translation.en: [Angel] There was something different about him.
translation.zh: 他就是有种与众不同的感觉

translation.en: We had an idea that someday he was gonna do something,
translation.zh: 我们都觉得总有一天 他会干出大事业 获得大成就

translation.en: that he was gonna go somewhere, he was gonna be something in life.
translation.zh: 他会干出大事业 获得大成就 他会活出精彩的人生

translation.en: [Bob] It's like a work of art in there.
translation.zh: 这简直是一件艺术品

translation.en: We were all proud of this, when he came out in the paper.
translation.zh: 他的作品登上了报纸 我们深感骄傲

translation.en: [Cartoon] I was just searching for my look, you know?
translation.zh: 我一直在寻找我的风格

translation.en: What felt good and what felt real to me.
translation.zh: 寻找感觉很对 又很真切的东西

translation.en: I went to LA Trade-Tech to learn Sign Graphics,
translation.zh: 我上了洛杉矶贸易技术学院 去学习标志平面艺术 理解文字架构

translation.en: to understand letters.
translation.zh: 去学习标志平面艺术 理解文字架构

translation.en: Letters have a weight to them.
translation.zh: 文字是有重量感的

translation.en: When I was in school, all the kids knew where the prisons were,
translation.zh: 在我上学期间 所有的孩子都知道监狱在哪儿

translation.en: and some of them would get letters from their family members,
translation.zh: 有的会收到他们家人从监狱的来信

translation.en: and I would look at the envelope
translation.zh: 我会观察信封

translation.en: and see these crazy collaged, pinta-style envelopes
translation.zh: 看着那些天马行空、加入剪贴画的 狱中家书风格的信封

translation.en: and I would think to myself,
translation.zh: 我暗自心想： “天啊 要是我能将这种风格的艺术

translation.en: "Man, if I could mix that style of artwork with bombing graffiti style,
translation.zh: 我暗自心想： “天啊 要是我能将这种风格的艺术 融入到我的炸街涂鸦里合二为一…”

translation.en: put them together."
translation.zh: 融入到我的炸街涂鸦里合二为一…”

translation.en: That's where my style was born.
translation.zh: 我的风格就此诞生了

translation.en: [Estevan] When I hit 19, I moved to Hollywood.
translation.zh: 我满19岁后便搬去了好莱坞

translation.en: Sunset Boulevard was cracking.
translation.zh: 日落大道很是热闹

translation.en: The Whisky, The Roxy. Hip-hop was new.
translation.zh: 有威士忌摇摆舞夜店和罗克西剧院 嘻哈刚兴起不久

translation.en: Just that scene was fucking off the chain,
translation.zh: 那种兴盛的场面太他妈牛了

translation.en: and I was working nightclubs for extra money.
translation.zh: 我在夜店工作 好赚些外快

translation.en: And that's where I met all the LA bands.
translation.zh: 我在那里结识了很多洛杉矶的乐队

translation.en: Ice-T and the Rhyme Syndicate, the Red Hot Chili Peppers,
translation.zh: 如Ice-T、节奏辛迪加、红辣椒乐队

translation.en: Boo-Yaa T.R.I.B.E., Everlast from House of Pain.
translation.zh: 布鸦帮以及痛苦泉源乐队的铁人

translation.en: That's how I met Muggs.
translation.zh: 我还结识了DJ马格斯

translation.en: And then he took me down to the block on Cypress Ave,
translation.zh: 然后他带我去了附近的柏树大街

translation.en: and that's where I met B-Real and Sen.
translation.zh: 我在那儿认识了B-Real和森

translation.en: [Muggs] So, this right here is SP 1200.
translation.zh: 这个就是SP1200

translation.en: This is the drum machine that we did um, all the House of Pain's records.
translation.zh: 痛苦泉源乐队的 所有唱片都是用这个鼓机做的

translation.en: The sample though-- For "Jump Around," I made it.
translation.zh: 这个《跳起来》的采样是我做的 （DJ马格斯）

translation.en: Horn player... came in the studio, played the horn,
translation.zh: 吹号手来录音棚进行了吹奏

translation.en: and I put it in here, then I detuned it.
translation.zh: 我把录音放进这里 然后调整音高 这样会给它一种失谐的感觉

translation.en: When you detune it, it gives it like a crunch.
translation.zh: 然后调整音高 这样会给它一种失谐的感觉

translation.en: It spreads it out a little bit. That's why that sounds unique.
translation.zh: 让声音更松散了 所以听着这么特别

translation.en: First time I met Estevan, he was working the door of a club on 2nd Street
translation.zh: 我初次见到埃斯特万时 他在二号街的一间夜店招呼客人 （铁人）

translation.en: in, like, Little Tokyo.
translation.zh: 在小东京那一带

translation.en: He just would always show me love and let me in.
translation.zh: 他总是很热情地招呼我进去

translation.en: That's the homie Steve-O, short for Steve Oriol.
translation.zh: 那是我哥们儿“斯特奥” 埃斯特万奥里奥尔的简称

translation.en: Switched it up to Scan. Scan was just Scandalous.
translation.zh: 后来又改叫他“斯堪” “斯堪”来自英文单词丑闻

translation.en: [Everlast] After we started getting the music together,
translation.zh: 我们把音乐创作好之后

translation.en: and we realized we were gonna go on the road, Muggs basically said,
translation.zh: 我们想要巡回演出 马格斯说： “我不知道谁能当巡演的经理人”

translation.en: "Yo, I know exactly who should be your road manager."
translation.zh: 马格斯说： “我不知道谁能当巡演的经理人”

translation.en: Who can I get that's fucking responsible and got they shit together?
translation.zh: 谁他妈能既有责任心又靠谱？

translation.en: And I was like, "Who?"
translation.zh: 我问：“谁？”

translation.en: I hit up Scan and then, um...
translation.zh: 我联系了斯堪 然后…

translation.en: He became our tour manager.
translation.zh: 他成了我们巡演的经理人

translation.en: That was it, right there.
translation.zh: 就这么开始了

translation.en: That was the beginning of us having worldwide escapades.
translation.zh: 我们就此踏上了全球性的大冒险

translation.en: [Estevan] In the beginning, people didn't know that House of Pain was white.
translation.zh: 人们一开始不知道 痛苦泉源是一支白人乐队

translation.en: People were like, "What the fuck?"
translation.zh: 他们心想：“什么鬼？

translation.en: "What are these fucking white boys walking through here?"
translation.zh: 这些白人小子他妈的进来干什么？”

translation.en: And then they'd hear the...
translation.zh: 然后他们听到…

translation.en: And the whole fucking club would just go buck wild, berserk,
translation.zh: 夜店里所有的人顿时全他妈疯了

translation.en: and they're just losing their fucking minds.
translation.zh: 简直就他妈的癫狂了

translation.en: From there, it just took off.
translation.zh: 然后我们的星途就此起航

translation.en: I was with the band in the music videos, like "Shamrocks and Shenanigans."
translation.zh: 我拍摄了乐队的音乐录影带 比如《三叶草和胡作非为》

translation.en: When I wasn't here in LA, I was on tour with House of Pain.
translation.zh: 如果我不在洛杉矶 那我就是在和痛苦泉源巡演

translation.en: My dad, he was a photographer.
translation.zh: 我爸爸是一位摄影师

translation.en: He thought I lived kind of a cool lifestyle, so...
translation.zh: 他觉得我的生活很酷 所以…

translation.en: This is my first camera that my dad gave me.
translation.zh: 这是我的第一部相机 是我爸给我的

translation.en: This is the one that I talk about when people say,
translation.zh: 每当有人问我是怎么开始摄影时

translation.en: "Oh, how did you start in photography?"
translation.zh: 我都会谈起这部相机

translation.en: [Everlast] We would go on these little really fucked-up promo tours,
translation.zh: 我们会去特他妈疯狂的小型宣传巡演

translation.en: and he was just always taking pictures.
translation.zh: 他总是在不断地拍照

translation.en: [Cartoon] I figured out that I was gonna be an artist
translation.zh: 当我意识到我该找一份真正的工作时

translation.en: when it was time to get a real job.
translation.zh: 我决心要成为一名艺术家

translation.en: I think airbrushing T-shirts, when I first did that, about 17 years old,
translation.zh: 我第一次喷绘T恤衫是在17岁左右

translation.en: is when I knew I could do this for a living.
translation.zh: 那时我就知道我能够以此谋生

translation.en: And I would paint portraits of people's cars,
translation.zh: 我会在T恤衫上喷绘别人的爱车

translation.en: put it on a T-shirt and put the name over top.
translation.zh: 我会在T恤衫上喷绘别人的爱车 然后在上面添上名字

translation.en: I just started working right off the bat.
translation.zh: 这项事业一下子就起步了

translation.en: Cartoon's Customs was born,
translation.zh: 卡通先生定制服务就此诞生

translation.en: kind of like preparing me to tattoo.
translation.zh: 可以说这为我的纹身事业做了铺垫

translation.en: [Muggs] Scandalous got the camera.
translation.zh: 掌镜的是丑闻

translation.en: Japan. It's how we do it.
translation.zh: 日本 我们来给你们露几手

translation.en: Chicken and soup. And I'm gonna get the spinach and butter.
translation.zh: 我要鸡肉和汤 还要一个黄油烩菠菜

translation.en: When you're on the road, man, shit can get a bit stressful.
translation.zh: 在巡演时 有时会有一些压力

translation.en: You need somebody out there that knows everybody's personalities
translation.zh: 你需要一个摸透了每个人的脾气

translation.en: and everything, keep everything at ease all the time.
translation.zh: 能够让一切保持轻松平和的人

translation.en: Every day was a new adventure, new city, new country, new shows.
translation.zh: 每一天都是新的冒险 新的城市、新的国家、新的演出

translation.en: It was the shit, to roll with the homie. Hey, Steve-O.
translation.zh: 和兄弟们在一起真是太屌了

translation.en: He wasn't Estevan Oriol, the photographer. He was the road dog.
translation.zh: 那时埃斯特万奥里奥尔还不是摄影师 而是巡演助手

translation.en: [Estevan] They got the homie.
translation.zh: 哥们儿被拦住了

translation.en: Cypress Hill, at the time, had not only... selling crazy records or platinum records,
translation.zh: 那时的柏树山嘻哈组 不仅唱片销量惊人 卖出白金唱片

translation.en: but a well-respected hip-hop group.
translation.zh: 还是备受尊崇的嘻哈组合

translation.en: B-Real was one of the dopest emcees in the world at the time.
translation.zh: B-Real是当时全球最牛的MC之一

translation.en: [B-Real] Look at this view, motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 你他妈看看这个夜景

translation.en: I look fucking good.
translation.zh: 我他妈看着真帅

translation.en: You never have to ask me if I'm ready. I'm always ready, motherfucker. Fuck you.
translation.zh: 你永远不用问我是否准备好了 因为我他妈时刻准备着 我操

translation.en: Oh, shit. That was a good hit.
translation.zh: 我靠 这口很上头

translation.en: Muggs had put on Estevan to work with the House of Pain guys
translation.zh: 马格斯向痛苦泉源引荐了埃斯特万

translation.en: and then he came to work with us, Cypress Hill.
translation.zh: 然后他过来和我们柏树山合作 （森道格）

translation.en: His first show with us was at Woodstock 1994.
translation.zh: 我们合作的首场演出是 1994年的伍德斯托克音乐节

translation.en: [Estevan] B-Real jumps off the stage into the crowd, now I gotta pull him out,
translation.zh: B-Real从舞台上跃入了人潮之中 我得把他拽出来 同时还要拍照片

translation.en: but while I'm pulling him out, I'm taking pictures.
translation.zh: 我得把他拽出来 同时还要拍照片

translation.en: That shit was fucking crazy.
translation.zh: 那玩意儿太他妈疯狂了

translation.en: Estevan, he had many different roles he played.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万担任了很多角色

translation.en: He was tour managing, he was our photographer and videographer.
translation.zh: 他当过巡演经理人 也是我们的摄影师和摄像师

translation.en: Those are all mine.
translation.zh: 对 这些全是我的

translation.en: -♪ Lala, la la, la la, la la ♪ -[B-Real] Let's rock 'n' roll.
translation.zh: 一起摇滚吧

translation.en: [B-Real] That's the way our crew was. We all worked together very tightly.
translation.zh: 我们的团队就是这样 我们紧密合作

translation.en: No one ever wore one hat.
translation.zh: 没有谁只有一项职责

translation.en: You know, everybody did multiple things just to get whatever we needed done,
translation.zh: 大家都是身兼数职 不管需要做什么 就去做

translation.en: and Estevan, you know, he covered a lot of bases,
translation.zh: 埃斯特万在同时负责很多事项

translation.en: and, at the same time, being our family and friend
translation.zh: 同时还是我们的家人和朋友

translation.en: and filling every spot that needed to be filled.
translation.zh: 哪里有需要 他就往哪儿上

translation.en: What's up, dude? This is motherfucking Scandalous.
translation.zh: 你好吗？我他妈是丑闻

translation.en: If you need anything, I got what you want, baby.
translation.zh: 只要你有需要 我就满足你 宝贝

translation.en: Motherfuckin', big old skunk.
translation.zh: 我他妈的有很大一包叶子哟

translation.en: Can you hear me? We're right here in fucked-up Cleveland,
translation.zh: 听得见吗？我们在操蛋的克里夫兰

translation.en: we just had Mother Nature trip the fuck out on us.
translation.zh: 他妈的大自然给我们来了个猛的

translation.en: [Sen] So Estevan came through and a lot of the great footage that we have now
translation.zh: 埃斯特万做到了 我们现有的许多 柏树山早期的珍贵影像

translation.en: from Cypress Hill in those early days, it was all Estevan Oriol footage.
translation.zh: 我们现有的许多 柏树山早期的珍贵影像 都是埃斯特万奥里奥尔拍下的

translation.en: I have Steve-O in my head always saying things like,
translation.zh: 在我的印象中 埃斯特万总说：“我就在这儿”

translation.en: "I'm just right here. I'm just right here."
translation.zh: 埃斯特万总说：“我就在这儿” （保罗罗森伯格 前柏树山经纪人）

translation.en: Him, I think, saying to me,
translation.zh: 我认为他是在对我说：

translation.en: "Don't worry about it. I'm doing my job. I'm right here."
translation.zh: “别担心 我在做我的工作 我就在这儿”

translation.en: [Estevan] Alright, we're still on our way.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们还在路上

translation.en: [Sen] The most pissed-on fucking countryside I've seen.
translation.zh: 这是我看过的最他妈破败的乡野

translation.en: -[Estevan] What else are we gonna do? -[Sen] We need to get there before you do.
translation.zh: 不然还能怎么做 傻帽？ 我们得赶在你之前到那儿

translation.en: -[boy] Oh, he's stuck! -[driver] You fucking bollocks!
translation.zh: 他妈的阉牛

translation.en: [Sen] What the fuck did he say?
translation.zh: 那人他妈的说什么？

translation.en: [driver] We have to go backstage, you know?
translation.zh: -我们得去后台 -没错

translation.en: [policeman] You can't get in that way. It's too small.
translation.zh: -那边进不去 -太小了

translation.en: -[driver] We wanna go backstage. -Yeah, you got a pass?
translation.zh: 我们想要去后台 你们有通行证吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we-- This is our pass. Cypress Hill.
translation.zh: 有啊 这就是我们的通行证：柏树山

translation.en: -[policeman] Cypress-- Oh, yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -柏树山啊！好的 -这才对嘛

translation.en: -[Sen] We made it, Engolf. -[Estevan chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们进去了 恩格夫

translation.en: [Estevan] I'm on tour with The Beastie Boys, No Doubt, The Fugees,
translation.zh: 我陪野兽男孩、无疑乐队 难民营乐队、软饼干乐队

translation.en: Limp Bizkit, Erykah Badu,
translation.zh: 我陪野兽男孩、无疑乐队 难民营乐队、软饼干乐队 艾瑞卡巴杜等很多乐队一同巡演

translation.en: and all these other bands,
translation.zh: 艾瑞卡巴杜等很多乐队一同巡演

translation.en: and I'm the only one there with a camera.
translation.zh: 我是唯一一个带着相机的人

translation.en: [Estevan] You're going from nothing to seeing thousands of people
translation.zh: 他们从籍籍无名 到有成千的观众听着他们的音乐

translation.en: losing their fucking minds to the song that you guys are bringing, you know?
translation.zh: 到有成千的观众听着他们的音乐 进入他妈的癫狂状态

translation.en: So, you're, like, "Fuck, man."
translation.zh: 所以我心想：“哇 我操”

translation.en: That's when I started, like, feeling like,
translation.zh: 从那时我开始意识到：

translation.en: "Okay, yeah, I need to take pictures of all this shit."
translation.zh: “好吧 我得用照片记录下这玩意儿”

translation.en: This is Southern California, motherfucker.
translation.zh: 这里是南加州 我操！

translation.en: [Estevan] I started offering my photos to the magazines,
translation.zh: 我开始向杂志投递我的摄影作品

translation.en: so music magazines started publishing my photos.
translation.zh: 于是音乐杂志开始刊登我的照片

translation.en: Yo, kick it off, dog.
translation.zh: 哟 来一口 哥们儿

translation.en: One, two, three. Chickity boom bang.
translation.zh: 一、二、三 好戏开始

translation.en: Estevan...
translation.zh: 埃斯特万

translation.en: The motherfucker was the man, you know? He was a man of many hats.
translation.zh: 他妈的太绝了 他身兼数职 （炼金士 制作人）

translation.en: When I met him, I was about 14, 15 years old.
translation.zh: 我认识他时 我当时十四五岁

translation.en: I was in the group The Whooliganz. I rapped. I was a rapper.
translation.zh: 是嘻哈团体街头恶棍的一员 我负责说唱 我是说唱歌手

translation.en: ♪ Book your silly crick Put your hands up ♪
translation.zh: （街头恶棍《举起双手》）

translation.en: [Alchemist] Me and my man Scotty. Scotty Caan.
translation.zh: 我和我兄弟斯科特一起 斯科特康恩

translation.en: [Scott] We had made a record with B-Real, so they were bringing us out on tour
translation.zh: 我们和B-Real合作了一张唱片 所以他们带我们一起巡演 为还未问世的唱片做宣传

translation.en: to pump up our record that hadn't come out yet.
translation.zh: 所以他们带我们一起巡演 为还未问世的唱片做宣传 （《举起双手》）

translation.en: So, I'm 16 years old in that situation,
translation.zh: 当时十六岁的我在这种情况下

translation.en: with nothing to do, but be alive for one hour.
translation.zh: 终日无所事事 只用正经一小时 （斯科特康恩）

translation.en: Otherwise, it was, like, hit on girls,
translation.zh: 剩余的时间就是把妹、飞叶子、喝酒

translation.en: smoke weed and drink, and hang out with your idols.
translation.zh: 剩余的时间就是把妹、飞叶子、喝酒 和我的偶像们在一起

translation.en: I don't like to represent an age group. I'm representing hip-hop.
translation.zh: 我不想代表某个年龄段 我代表的是嘻哈

translation.en: You know, he started fucking with the camera then...
translation.zh: 他那时候开始他妈的搞照相机了

translation.en: Alchemist started fucking with beats then and...
translation.zh: 炼金士开始他妈的搞节奏了

translation.en: -Can we say "fuck"? -[producer] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我能说“他妈的”吗？ -能

translation.en: You talk about that time, you can't not curse. It's impossible, you know?
translation.zh: 说那段时期的事 不爆粗口是不可能的

translation.en: You gotta remember, in '93, Soul Assassins,
translation.zh: 你可别忘了 在1993年 灵魂刺客

translation.en: Cypress Hill, House of Pain, they were the top of rap.
translation.zh: 柏树山、痛苦泉源是顶尖的说唱组合

translation.en: You know, you had Dre and Snoop otherwise,
translation.zh: 德瑞博士和史努比狗狗也很强

translation.en: but other than that, this was the biggest shit going on.
translation.zh: 但除此之外 这就是当时最牛逼的玩意儿

translation.en: That was Soul Assassins. We were the top.
translation.zh: 那就是灵魂刺客 我们在顶峰

translation.en: [Pat] I met Estevan Oriol 25 plus years ago.
translation.zh: 我认识埃斯特万奥里奥尔超过25年了

translation.en: It was surreal for a 16-year-old to go to a concert
translation.zh: 对16岁的我来说 去看街头恶棍为处于巅峰时期的

translation.en: with The Whooliganz opening up for House of Pain and Cypress Hill
translation.zh: 去看街头恶棍为处于巅峰时期的 痛苦泉源和柏树山做开场不可思议

translation.en: at the height of their career.
translation.zh: 痛苦泉源和柏树山做开场不可思议

translation.en: We were backstage, and they almost shut the whole concert down
translation.zh: 我们人在后台 他们差点取消演唱会

translation.en: because some guy named Estevan punched out the bootleggers.
translation.zh: 因为一个叫埃斯特万的人 把一些盗图贩给揍了

translation.en: They would get your artwork from the newspaper and make a shirt.
translation.zh: 他们会从报纸上盗取你的作品 用它来设计衣服

translation.en: Like an hour before the show, a couple-- All the homeboys
translation.zh: 在演出开始一小时前 那些伙计们会扣上连帽衫

translation.en: would like, put their hoods on and, like, go walk through the parking lot
translation.zh: 那些伙计们会扣上连帽衫 去停车场晃悠

translation.en: and you'd just be sittin' by the, you know, by the trailers,
translation.zh: 你坐在巡演房车边上 然后听到…

translation.en: -and you just hear, "Wham!" -Damn!
translation.zh: 你坐在巡演房车边上 然后听到… -砰！ -我靠！

translation.en: And dudes would just get knocked out cold, like...
translation.zh: 那几个人直接被揍倒在地

translation.en: I won't name any names.
translation.zh: 名字我就不说了

translation.en: -[producer] Name names. -Muggs, Estevan.
translation.zh: 你说吧 马格斯 埃斯特万

translation.en: Motherfucker said something...
translation.zh: 一个混账东西说了句屁话

translation.en: So I punch him in the face.
translation.zh: 所以我给他脸上来了一拳

translation.en: Poor guy.
translation.zh: 可怜的家伙

translation.en: [Pat] So, that's when I met Estevan Oriol.
translation.zh: 我因此结识了埃斯特万奥里奥尔

translation.en: Him beating up a bootlegger in San Francisco at a Soul Assassins' concert.
translation.zh: 他在灵魂刺客的旧金山演唱会上 揍了一个盗图贩

translation.en: When I met Steve-O, he was tour manager,
translation.zh: 我认识埃斯特万的时候 他是巡演经理人

translation.en: the all-time funny guy...
translation.zh: 随时都在搞笑

translation.en: slash photographer, slash DJ.
translation.zh: 同时还是摄影师和DJ

translation.en: From their platinum album Temples of Boom, you guys, here is Cypress Hill! ♪ All this confusion's stressing me Out in my mind ♪
translation.zh: 接下来有请柏树山表演 其白金唱片《繁荣圣殿》中的歌曲！

translation.en: There were times I think where he even may have filled in
translation.zh: 有几次他好像还充当柏树山的团员

translation.en: as a member of Cypress Hill in interviews.
translation.zh: 有几次他好像还充当柏树山的团员 接受了采访

translation.en: You can't blame all of us for these few groups.
translation.zh: 你不能因为少数团体的行为 责骂我们所有人

translation.en: [Jim] Clearly, the controversy is going to continue.
translation.zh: 这场争议显然会持续发酵

translation.en: -Thanks a lot for joining us. -Thanks for having us.

translation.zh: 歌手游戏就在几首饶舌歌里 提到了卡通先生

translation.en: [Paul R., Jr] You know, I'm a hip-hop fan, and, so, I would see Cartoon
translation.zh: 我喜欢嘻哈 所以我会在 音乐录影带里看到卡通先生

translation.en: pop up in music videos.
translation.zh: 所以我会在 音乐录影带里看到卡通先生

translation.en: ♪ I even got a tattoo With your name across the chest ♪
translation.zh: （瘦痞子）

translation.en: [Ryan] In the waiting room,
translation.zh: 我在等候室里

translation.en: I remember looking at the pictures on the wall,
translation.zh: 我记得我看着墙上的照片

translation.en: pictures Estevan probably took.
translation.zh: 很可能是埃斯特万拍的照片

translation.en: Cartoon was tatting up all those, 50 Cent, Eminem and Dr. Dre.
translation.zh: 卡通先生给五角、阿姆、德瑞博士 这些人都纹过身

translation.en: If Xzibit was getting tattooed,
translation.zh: 如果艾勒比来纹身 埃斯特万在拍照的话

translation.en: Estevan was photographing him, and you'd see that photo everywhere.
translation.zh: 如果艾勒比来纹身 埃斯特万在拍照的话 你会四处看见那张照片

translation.en: [Ryan] I knew pretty early on that he had done the Xs on Xzibit,
translation.zh: 我很早就知道 艾勒比身上的X是他刺的

translation.en: that he did 50 Cent's back,
translation.zh: 五角的后背是他刺的

translation.en: You know, 50 got that shit on his back, man.
translation.zh: 五角的后背有个很牛逼的刺青

translation.en: That shit is crazy.
translation.zh: 哇 那玩意儿简直了

translation.en: ♪ Go ahead, put your back into it ♪
[Cartoon] More people were coming down, more people were willing to come downtown.
translation.zh: 更多人过来了 更多人愿意过来了

translation.en: I mean, back then, people used to complain about having to drive to downtown.
translation.zh: 过去人们会抱怨来市中心太麻烦了

translation.en: "Oh, all the way downtown?"
translation.zh: “哦 市中心好远啊”

translation.en: They wouldn't go east of La Brea.
translation.zh: 拉布雷亚再往东 他们就不去了

translation.en: 50 Cent, my boy Cartoon. We out here in LA, boy.
translation.zh: 我是五角 来洛杉矶找我哥们儿卡通先生了

translation.en: [Estevan] Cartoon was tattooing 50 Cent in there,
translation.zh: 卡通先生在里面给五角纹身

translation.en: and he said he had to go have a meeting.
translation.zh: 然后他说他要去开会

translation.en: He was going to sign with Jimmy Iovine at Interscope.
translation.zh: 他要去新视镜唱片和吉米艾欧文签约

translation.en: [Estevan] So he had to leave for an hour or two.
translation.zh: 所以他得离开一两个小时

translation.en: So me and Cartoon left in his brand-new white Escalade
translation.zh: 所以我和卡通先生 坐着他全新的白色凯雷德

translation.en: on, like, 22-inch rims.
translation.zh: 上面配了22寸的轮圈

translation.en: [Estevan] About six police officers followed us down that street.
translation.zh: 大概有六名警察一路追着我们

translation.en: They pulled us both out of the car.
translation.zh: 让我们两个下车

translation.en: They threw me on the ground, put the handcuffs behind my back,
translation.zh: 他们把我推倒在地 把我的手铐在背后

translation.en: put his shotgun in the back of my head right here,
translation.zh: 把他的枪对准我的后脑勺这里

translation.en: and he was shaking. What happened was...
translation.zh: 他一直在抖 结果事情是这样的

translation.en: Some motorcycle cop was put in the hospital
translation.zh: 有个骑警被一个 剃了头的年轻男子打伤住院了

translation.en: by a young gentleman with a shaved head looking a lot like me,
translation.zh: 有个骑警被一个 剃了头的年轻男子打伤住院了 和我长得很像

translation.en: driving a truck like this.
translation.zh: 就开着像这样的卡车

translation.en: [Estevan] We have customers here from out of town.
translation.zh: 我们有从别处远道而来的客户

translation.en: And they go, "Hey, you guys gotta go," then 50 Cent said...
translation.zh: 他们说：“你们得走了 五角来了”

translation.en: I ain't did it. Cartoon ain't did it. Leave us the fuck alone.
translation.zh: 不是我干的 不是卡通先生干的 你他妈的别烦我们

translation.en: [man] If you go on a talk show, you have a big story to tell.
translation.zh: 你上谈话节目时可以讲这个精彩故事

translation.en: I get my tattoo done...
translation.zh: 我正在刺纹身…

translation.en: -[man] That tattoo artist got- -Yeah, on my back. And they're harassing.
translation.zh: 结果纹身师被逮捕了 是啊 他们骚扰我们

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
translation.zh: 我们绝不会离开

translation.en: He's a friend of mine from Virginia,
translation.zh: 我有个朋友在酒庄 等他看到这玩意儿

translation.en: but he's going to see this shit and that's gonna be it.
translation.zh: 我有个朋友在酒庄 等他看到这玩意儿 他会喜欢极了

translation.en: ♪ To flip dough To get more for sho' ♪
translation.zh: （史莱许）

translation.en: Did you ever get anybody, like, right at this point, "Wait, I wanna change it"?
translation.zh: 有没有人都刺到这个地步了 然后中途想改？

translation.en: All you need now is, uh, Mister Cartoon's signature.
translation.zh: 我现在只差卡通先生的签名了

translation.en: [Nas] What's up, y'all? It's Nas.
translation.zh: 你们好吗？

translation.en: Chillin' up here with my man Cartoon.
translation.zh: 我是纳斯 今天来找我的哥们儿卡通先生

translation.en: [Method] Hey, yo, this is Meth right here.
translation.zh: 嘿 我是方法人

translation.en: I just got a tattoo done by the world-famous Cartoon.
translation.zh: 举世闻名的卡通先生刚给我刺了纹身

translation.en: -Cartoon. -Cartoon, baby.
translation.zh: -卡通先生 -卡通先生 耶！厉害吧？

translation.en: -What? -[tattoo machine buzzing]
translation.zh: -卡通先生 -卡通先生 耶！厉害吧？ （神童）

translation.en: [Travis] Cartoon is... just an OG.
translation.zh: 卡通先生就是一个经典

translation.en: He's one of the illest.
translation.zh: 他是最牛的人之一

translation.en: Cartoon really made black and gray popular again.
translation.zh: 卡通先生真的是 让黑灰纹身再度流行了起来

translation.en: I'd sit down with Cartoon, and we really wouldn't even have a plan.
translation.zh: 我找卡通先生纹身都不需要有图稿

translation.en: I would trust him to just go freehand.
translation.zh: 我会让他自由发挥

translation.en: I had an appointment with Cartoon. We all came to my spot in Corona.
translation.zh: 我预约了卡通先生 我们一起来到了我在科洛纳的家

translation.en: We had just met, but it felt, like, you know,
translation.zh: 虽然我们才刚见面 但我感觉

translation.en: we had all been homies for a long time.
translation.zh: 我们已经是很久的哥们儿了

translation.en: [Cartoon] We got the kids with us, we're taking the whole families, Fourth of July.
translation.zh: 我们会带上孩子一起玩 独立日会带着全家出游

translation.en: [Travis] The first tattoo Cartoon did on me was
translation.zh: 卡通先生给我做的第一个纹身 是我头部侧边的祈祷之手

translation.en: praying hands on the side of my head.
translation.zh: 是我头部侧边的祈祷之手

translation.en: It said, "Barker," like my family name.
translation.zh: 上面写了我的姓“巴克”

translation.en: It was like therapy or something, you know.
translation.zh: 这有一种疗愈感 你知道吗？

translation.en: Just sitting with Toons, you don't even realize you're getting tattooed.
translation.zh: 坐在卡通先生旁边 你都意识不到你在纹身

translation.en: I think the next tattoos he did
translation.zh: 他给我刺的下一个纹身

translation.en: was he started filling in my ghetto blaster.
translation.zh: 应该是给我的便携式音响添上细节

translation.en: He also did this Marilyn piece
translation.zh: 他还做了我喉结上的玛丽莲梦露纹身

translation.en: right on my Adam's apple, that one's a hard one.
translation.zh: 他还做了我喉结上的玛丽莲梦露纹身 那个很有难度

translation.en: Look at that shit.
translation.zh: （马克霍普斯 闪亮182） 还他妈不赖

translation.en: My son was born, and we were recording the new record,
translation.zh: 我儿子出生了 我们又在录制新唱片

translation.en: and I'd decided that I wanted to get my wife and son's name tattooed, and Travis said...
translation.zh: 我想刺上我妻子和儿子的名字 特拉维斯说…

translation.en: "Then you gotta go to Cartoon, he's the best."
translation.zh: 你得去找卡通先生 他是最棒的

translation.en: And we were literally set up on a road case in the living room
translation.zh: 我们直接在客厅里的 一个乐器保护箱上面开始了

translation.en: with all my bass equipment in it.
translation.zh: 我的低音设备全在里面

translation.en: And I was nervous about getting my first tattoos.
translation.zh: 我是第一次纹身 所以很紧张

translation.en: I remember just as he was about to start, he said,
translation.zh: 我记得他刚要开始时 他说：

translation.en: "Hey, man, I wanna give you props."
translation.zh: “嘿 兄弟 你很了不起…”

translation.en: [Cartoon] Being the first-class guy you are, you picked
translation.zh: 你是个一流的好男人

translation.en: one of the more painful spots to get tattooed.
translation.zh: 还选了最痛的部位之一刺纹身

translation.en: [chuckles] And he started tattooing "Jack."
translation.zh: 他开始刺上杰克的名字

translation.en: And about halfway through "Jack,"
translation.zh: 杰克刺到一半的时候

translation.en: I didn't know that the wife was gonna happen at all.
translation.zh: 我不确定还要不要刺我妻子的名字

translation.en: These are still the only tattoos that I have.
translation.zh: 我现在还是只有这两个纹身 我也说不上来

translation.en: I don't know, being tattooed by Cartoon
translation.zh: 我现在还是只有这两个纹身 我也说不上来 让卡通先生刺纹身 有种加入独家俱乐部的感觉

translation.en: kind of feels like you're in an exclusive club?
translation.zh: 让卡通先生刺纹身 有种加入独家俱乐部的感觉

translation.en: Anybody who has Cartoon tats,
translation.zh: 不管大小 只要你有卡通先生的纹身

translation.en: of any significance, he's like... your brothers.
translation.zh: 不管大小 只要你有卡通先生的纹身 我们就能称兄道弟

translation.en: Now I'm brothers with 50 Cent, Eminem, Beyoncé, and everybody else.
translation.zh: 现在我和五角、阿姆和碧昂丝等人 都能称兄道弟

translation.en: [Roger] Cartoon is instrumental in bringing his tattoo style
translation.zh: 在让他的纹身风格进入主流这一点上 卡通先生功不可没

translation.en: into the mainstream for a really simple reason.
translation.zh: 在让他的纹身风格进入主流这一点上 卡通先生功不可没 原因其实很简单

translation.en: He's tattooing celebrities,
translation.zh: 他会给明星刺纹身

translation.en: he's tattooing athletes.
translation.zh: 他会给职业运动员刺纹身

translation.en: Those people are photographed.
translation.zh: 这些人的照片里都能看到这些纹身

translation.en: You see those tattoos. Those people are everywhere.
translation.zh: 这些人的照片里都能看到这些纹身 这些人随处可见

translation.en: [Dallas] I was lucky enough to go to my first World Series and win it.
translation.zh: 我第一次参加世界大赛就有幸获胜

translation.en: I wanted that to stay with me for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 我想一辈子铭记这份荣耀

translation.en: So I wanted Toons.
translation.zh: 所以我想要卡通先生给我刺

translation.en: Being a tattoo artist, our heroes were working out their kitchen
translation.zh: 作为纹身师 我们崇拜的人就在自家厨房刺纹身

translation.en: or their garage at their mom's house.
translation.zh: 或是在妈妈家的车库里开店

translation.en: They hadn't been to really a red-carpet level at that point.
translation.zh: 那时他们还没有到达一种明星的级别

translation.en: There was some tattooers that was higher than others that we looked up to...
translation.zh: 我们崇拜的有一些纹身师 可能比其他的高端一些

translation.en: but it wasn't set up that that was the jewelry of an NBA player.
translation.zh: 但并没有被视为美国职篮球星的珠宝

translation.en: -[commentator 1] Kobe! -[commentator 2] Attacking. All the way! [commentator 1] Kobe did it!
translation.zh: -科比布莱恩特！ -布莱恩特发动进攻 灌篮成功！

translation.en: Tattoos are a big thing in NBA.
translation.zh: 纹身不只是在美国职篮圈很受欢迎

translation.en: I mean, not just in NBA, but just in sports culture in general.
translation.zh: 纹身不只是在美国职篮圈很受欢迎 在整个运动文化里也是

translation.en: You know, I always said-- 'Cause I had guys on the team that had tattoos,
translation.zh: 我总这么说 因为我有的队友有纹身

translation.en: but they didn't go to Mister Cartoon, and it becomes pretty apparent
translation.zh: 但不是卡通先生刺的 我一看就知道

translation.en: because I can't read what the fuck's on their arm anyway.
translation.zh: 因为我他妈认不清他们手臂上刺的字

translation.en: [Cartoon] A lot of it is not how good of a tattooer you are.
translation.zh: 这很大程度上不取决于你有多会纹身

translation.en: It's your timing and who you surround yourself by.
translation.zh: 而是你的时机和你周围的圈子

translation.en: You could be the dopest motherfucker in the world,
translation.zh: 你可能是世界上最牛逼的纹身师

translation.en: but if no one sees your shit 'cause you're in some small town somewhere,
translation.zh: 但如果你在一个小镇上 你的玩意儿就没有能见度

translation.en: that's not Hollywood.
translation.zh: 好莱坞可不是这样

translation.en: [Cartoon] We're right here in the mix of the shit.
translation.zh: 我们就在名流汇集的中心

translation.en: I was in China. We were staying at a hotel.
translation.zh: 我有次去中国 在酒店入住

translation.en: I went down to the weight room. There was a young woman working behind the desk, right?
translation.zh: 我去了楼下的举重房 服务台有个年轻女子

translation.en: They have a policy.
translation.zh: 酒店的政策是手臂上有纹身的人

translation.en: If you have tattoos on your arms, you have to wear long sleeves.
translation.zh: 酒店的政策是手臂上有纹身的人 必须穿长袖

translation.en: I'm like, "What?"
translation.zh: 我一脸错愕

translation.en: She says, "I'm sorry, you have to put on long sleeves."
translation.zh: 她说：“抱歉 这样不行 你必须穿长袖”

translation.en: And she goes, "But that's Mister Cartoon, right? He did the artwork."
translation.zh: 然后她说：“那是卡通先生刺的吧？ 是他设计的吧？”

translation.en: I'm like, "Dude, how did you know that's Mister Cartoon
translation.zh: 我说：“天啊 你怎么知道是卡通先生？”

translation.en: but you know, I can't--?" You know.
translation.zh: 我都说不出话来了

translation.en: But she knew that was Mister Cartoon's artwork.
translation.zh: 但她看得出来那是卡通先生的手笔

translation.en: This is a young woman in Beijing. It's so far removed from LA.
translation.zh: 她是个在北京的年轻女子 和洛杉矶相距十万八千里

translation.en: That's big.
translation.zh: 真是太震撼了

translation.en: Waiting on Paul Rosenberg...
translation.zh: 我在等保罗罗森伯格

translation.en: manager of the stars, Eminem.
translation.zh: 一众明星的经理人 比如阿姆

translation.en: Paul, being the person he is,
translation.zh: 保罗是很有眼光的人

translation.en: recognized Estevan and his photography skills,
translation.zh: 他看中了埃斯特万的摄影技术

translation.en: and Cartoon with his art skills and packaging.
translation.zh: 以及卡通先生的艺术才华和形象包装

translation.en: I certainly figured out
translation.zh: （保罗罗森伯格）

translation.en: ways to maximize having access to them.
translation.zh: 很明显 我找到了 最大限度接触他们的方法

translation.en: You know, everything, from working with Eminem...
translation.zh: 比如和阿姆一起共事

translation.en: You see Big Lepke?
translation.zh: 你看到大利普克了吗？

translation.en: ...and designing the Shady Records' logo.
translation.zh: 以及设计痞子唱片的标志

translation.en: [Cartoon] When I was doing the portrait of Eminem's daughter,
translation.zh: 我在刺阿姆女儿的肖像时

translation.en: I knew it was big, but I didn't know how.
translation.zh: 我知道这意义非凡 但我也不知道会怎样

translation.en: You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 你懂我意思吗？

translation.en: You know, I wasn't looking at the major impact that it would have later.
translation.zh: 我并没有谋求这之后 会有多大的影响力

translation.en: I was just doing what was in front of me.
translation.zh: 我只是在做眼前的这件事而已

translation.en: Eminem video shoot.
translation.zh: 阿姆在拍音乐录影带

translation.en: Waiting on doing some tattoos on the homie.
translation.zh: 我等着给我哥们儿刺点纹身

translation.en: [Eminem] They came to Detroit, and he said, "We should do a mushroom."
translation.zh: 他们来到了底特律 然后他说：“我们应该刺一个蘑菇

translation.en: He said-- He was like, "I can do a big-ass mushroom."
translation.zh: 我可以刺个特他妈大的蘑菇”

translation.en: He did all-- my whole sleeves.
translation.zh: 他刺满了我的手臂

translation.en: I don't know, I got them removed since then. I'm kidding.
translation.zh: 我后来就把它洗掉了 我开玩笑的

translation.en: I wanna get something like this over here,
translation.zh: 我想在这边刺点类似的东西

translation.en: but just-- I wanna make sure that it's the right shit
translation.zh: 但我想确定这是我想要的玩意儿

translation.en: 'cause tattoos are for life.
translation.zh: 因为纹身是一辈子的

translation.en: [Cartoon] You know, We could bust something out like your--
translation.zh: 行 我可以做一些比如…

translation.en: Your daughter's portrait.
translation.zh: 你女儿的肖像

translation.en: Right here, I would probably put something around this
translation.zh: 在这个位置 我可能会多加点东西

translation.en: to beefen it up a little bit.
translation.zh: 让线条更丰满一些

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Cartoon] And maybe put another ribbon and kind of tie it into the other side.
translation.zh: 然后可能再加个缎带 和另一边的做一个连结

translation.en: It's so crazy.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了

translation.en: One of the things was Hailie. I wanted to put her on my arm.
translation.zh: 其中一个是海莉 我想把她刺到我的手臂上

translation.en: [Estevan] My favorite rappers were getting tattooed. Like, that shit trips you out.
translation.zh: 我最爱的说唱歌手在刺纹身 这玩意儿太上头了

translation.en: Let me put some bullet holes.
translation.zh: 我要在上面加点子弹孔

translation.en: [Estevan] I remember being in the bathroom
translation.zh: 我记得我当时在洗手间里

translation.en: and I was tripping out that I was the only person there
translation.zh: 我很久都没回过神来 因为当时只有我一个人在那里

translation.en: documenting Cartoon tattooing the biggest artist in the world at that time.
translation.zh: 记录下了卡通先生给 全球当红大明星纹身的过程

translation.en: [Estevan] I remember, man, I'm getting those shots
translation.zh: 我记得我心想：“天啊 我现在拍下的影像

translation.en: of the greatest of all times in our lifetime,
translation.zh: 我现在拍下的影像 记录下了我们这一生中最闪耀的人

translation.en: like the number one celebrity, artist,
translation.zh: 他是全球首屈一指的… 明星、艺人 总之就是最棒的”

translation.en: anything in the world.
translation.zh: 明星、艺人 总之就是最棒的”

translation.en: And I was there documenting it,
translation.zh: 而我就在现场做记录

translation.en: I wished, I remember, like, kind of like smiling in the mirror, like I was happy.
translation.zh: 我记得当时对着镜子微笑 我很开心

translation.en: I got a question I wanna ask you.
translation.zh: 我有个问题想要问你们

translation.en: How many people are sick...
translation.zh: 你们当中有多少人厌倦了…

translation.en: of motherfuckers talking shit about me?
translation.zh: 那些混账东西对我口出恶言？

translation.en: [Estevan] And it was a cool feeling, you know?
translation.zh: 那是一种很酷的感觉

translation.en: It made me, like, think of all the times when there was, like,
translation.zh: 这让我回想起很多瞬间

translation.en: a picture of Elvis Presley getting his hair cut
translation.zh: 比如看到一张 有人给猫王剪头发的照片

translation.en: and it's just him and the barber.
translation.zh: 照片中就只有他和理发师

translation.en: Damn, that photographer had some crazy-ass access, you know?
translation.zh: “我靠 那位摄影师居然可以在场 那得多牛逼啊”

translation.en: Oh, yeah, get one of those too.
translation.zh: 对了 那个我也要刺一个

translation.en: You have to put that shit on your back.
translation.zh: 你要把那玩意儿刺在背上

translation.en: Cartoon. Big Cartoon.
translation.zh: 卡通先生 卡通先生大神 我就这么叫他了

translation.en: Call him Big Cartoon now.
translation.zh: 卡通先生大神 我就这么叫他了

translation.en: Guy's good, man.
translation.zh: 那家伙很棒

translation.en: He's pretty decent.
translation.zh: 他真的很不错

translation.en: [Cartoon] Estevan's eye for seeing what angle to shoot something...
translation.zh: 埃斯特万对拍摄角度有独到的眼光

translation.en: how to bring someone's best look out of them.
translation.zh: 知道如何彰显一个人最好看的一面

translation.en: [Cartoon] A lot of other photographers, that's what they don't understand.
translation.zh: 这是很多摄影师弄不明白的地方

translation.en: They don't know how to make someone look good.
translation.zh: 他们不知道怎么把一个人拍得好看

translation.en: [presenter] George Lopez!
translation.zh: 乔治洛佩兹！

translation.en: [George] When I got my star in the Walk of Fame, Estevan came over
translation.zh: 我在星光大道上获得星星时 埃斯特万过来 给我拍了这张特他妈棒的照片

translation.en: and took this fucking amazing picture of me
translation.zh: 埃斯特万过来 给我拍了这张特他妈棒的照片

translation.en: surrounded by the fans,
translation.zh: 周围是我的粉丝和数千民众

translation.en: and thousands of people, maybe a couple thousand people.
translation.zh: 周围是我的粉丝和数千民众 大概有两千人吧

translation.en: And to get that,
translation.zh: 能够用照片记录下我穿着西装

translation.en: of me and my suit, of me with the flag,
translation.zh: 能够用照片记录下我穿着西装 在好莱坞大道举着国旗

translation.en: of me surrounded by, you know,
translation.zh: 在好莱坞大道举着国旗

translation.en: other Latinos right there on Hollywood Boulevard was-- It was great.
translation.zh: 被其他的拉丁裔群众环绕 那感觉太棒了

translation.en: [Cartoon] Same thing, that's why he gets a lot of jobs in hip-hop.
translation.zh: 同样 这也是他 有那么多嘻哈客户的原因

translation.en: 'Cause he knows hip-hop.
translation.zh: 因为他懂嘻哈

translation.en: Grew up in that shit.
translation.zh: 他从小就喜欢这玩意儿

translation.en: So it's better for someone from the inside
translation.zh: 所以最好的就是能有懂行的人

translation.en: to shoot the outside, you know?
translation.zh: 由内而外地来捕捉 你懂吗？

translation.en: On my Ego Trippin' cover, me and Estevan,
translation.zh: 为了拍摄我《自大狂》的专辑封面 我和埃斯特万

translation.en: we went back to my old high school, Poly High School,
translation.zh: 回到了我以前的高中 职业技术高中

translation.en: got an old B210 like I used to have in high school,
translation.zh: 弄来了一辆老式的B210车 就像我高中时期的一样

translation.en: had on my Letterman jacket,
translation.zh: 穿上我的校队夹克外套

translation.en: and it just felt like I was in high school. That shit was hard.
translation.zh: 感觉就像我重回高中了 那玩意儿不好拍

translation.en: But only he could capture what I wanted.
translation.zh: 但只有他能抓住我想要的神韵

translation.en: This is an era when Dogg didn't have money.
translation.zh: 那个时期的史努比狗狗口袋里没钱

translation.en: He understood that.
translation.zh: 他明白这一点

translation.en: Shoot Snoop Doggy Dogg. Snoop Doggy fizzle fizzle.
translation.zh: 今天给史努比狗狗拍照 颓丧时期的史努比狗狗

translation.en: If Estevan did your album cover, Cartoon was doing the artwork.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万负责拍专辑封面 卡通先生则负责艺术设计

translation.en: [Cartoon] Some people try to do everything by themselves.
translation.zh: 有的人想要一人包办所有的事

translation.en: We just did different ends of the table.
translation.zh: 我们则是各司其职

translation.en: He covered photography
translation.zh: 他负责摄影

translation.en: while I would do the logo, I would draw the concept.
translation.zh: 我则负责标志设计和艺术创意

translation.en: I've seen this, when they're snapping 400 pictures to get some shit,
translation.zh: 我看过有的人 连拍400张也找不到感觉

translation.en: and I've seen this guy walk out...
translation.zh: 而这个家伙一出手…

translation.en: Bam.
translation.zh: 搞定

translation.en: Stand against that wall. Click.
translation.zh: “靠着墙站” 咔嚓

translation.en: And then you see it, it could be an album cover
translation.zh: 然后那张照片就成了专辑封面

translation.en: or, like, the cover of a magazine.
translation.zh: 或者是杂志封面

translation.en: You feel like you're being directed, like you're in the hands of the director.
translation.zh: 你会感觉有人指导你 指导你怎么摆动作

translation.en: I love it when a director knows exactly what he wants
translation.zh: 我喜欢明确知道自己要什么的摄像师

translation.en: and he says, "Look, this is what I want."
translation.zh: 他说：“我想要这样”

translation.en: Okay, cool. You got hired to direct me, I got hired to act.
translation.zh: 行 没问题 你的工作是指导我 我负责动作和表情

translation.en: I was around lowriders and gangsters, and I was around hip-hop.
translation.zh: 我混过趴地跳跳车和匪帮的圈子 也混过嘻哈圈

translation.en: With both of those comes girls.
translation.zh: 这两个圈子都能接触到女生

translation.en: [Estevan] LA culture.
translation.zh: 这是洛杉矶的文化

translation.en: Like, I get Estevan's book. Wow.
translation.zh: 我翻了埃斯特万的摄影集 哇

translation.en: I always thought my dad's work was very inspiring.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得我爸的作品很鼓舞人心

translation.en: For girls, like, he just captures beauty, like, so perfectly.
translation.zh: 他把镜头里女生的美体现得淋漓尽致

translation.en: [Cartoon] A lot of the art too comes from jail, where guys are sitting in a cell
translation.zh: 这种艺术的很大一部分 也源自男人蹲在监狱里

translation.en: and fantasizing about their girl.
translation.zh: 然后幻想着他们的姑娘

translation.en: I always looked at it
translation.zh: 我一直觉得这个很能…

translation.en: as really uplifting women.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得这个很能… 提升女性地位

translation.en: They may not have any clothes on, or they'd be topless.
translation.zh: 虽然她们没穿衣服或者裸着上身

translation.en: I think as an artist, I always looked at the beauty of it,
translation.zh: 但我作为艺术家 我一直着眼于其中的美

translation.en: but knowing who to shoot,
translation.zh: 但是你要知道该拍谁

translation.en: where to shoot, when to shoot,
translation.zh: 在哪儿拍 什么时候拍

translation.en: you look at that, you're like, "That shit's real."
translation.zh: 当你看到照片时会想：“这真牛逼”

translation.en: [over phone] If I wasn't shooting LA culture,
translation.zh: 我不是在拍摄洛杉矶文化

translation.en: I was going on tour with bands like Blink-182,
translation.zh: 就是在陪 闪亮182这样的乐队一起巡演

translation.en: only I wasn't a road manager anymore.
translation.zh: 但我再也不是巡演经理人了

translation.en: [Travis] Right about the time we went on that tour to Iraq and Europe,
translation.zh: 当时我们的巡演 去到了伊拉克和欧洲

translation.en: touring was, like, more fun when you brought friends.
translation.zh: 有朋友相伴让巡演更加好玩

translation.en: Having Estevan out there was so fun.
translation.zh: 有埃斯特万陪着乐趣多多

translation.en: It is freezing like a motherfucker in Paris.
translation.zh: 巴黎简直是他妈的冷爆了

translation.en: [Mark] The tour that Estevan came with us in Europe
translation.zh: 埃斯特万陪我们去的那次欧洲巡演

translation.en: was a very difficult time
translation.zh: 埃斯特万陪我们去的那次欧洲巡演 是闪亮182很艰难的一段时期

translation.en: in Blink's history.
translation.zh: 是闪亮182很艰难的一段时期

translation.en: We were arguing...
translation.zh: 我们总是争吵

translation.en: the entire tour.
translation.zh: 整场巡演都在吵

translation.en: Leave me fucking be! I'm fucking tired!
translation.zh: 你他妈别烦我 我他妈累死了！

translation.en: -[Travis] How was that? -[Estevan] It was the shit.
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: -That was fun, right? -[Estevan] Hell, yeah.
translation.zh: -酷毙了 -很好玩吧？

translation.en: [Mark] The last show that we played before the band broke up the first time,
translation.zh: 那是我们乐队第一次解散前的 最后一场演出

translation.en: we finished the last note, and I thought to myself,
translation.zh: 我们唱完最后一个音 然后我心想：

translation.en: "This is probably gonna be the last show. This feels like the end of something."
translation.zh: “这可能是最后一场演出了 这有种终结的感觉”

translation.en: And Estevan came on stage and said,
translation.zh: 然后埃斯特万上台来说：

translation.en: "Hey, I wanna get a shot of the three of you guys."
translation.zh: “喂 我想给你们三个拍张合影”

translation.en: And it's actually on our Greatest Hits album that came out after that.
translation.zh: 后来我们的精选辑封面 就用了这张照片

translation.en: It goes back to Estevan's ethos of putting himself in these situations
translation.zh: 这都要归功于埃斯特万 把自己置身于这些情境之中的精神

translation.en: where he is able to document things that are happening with other people.
translation.zh: 使他能够记录下他人的经历

translation.en: The United States and our allies have prevailed.
translation.zh: 美国及其盟友取得了胜利

translation.en: [Mark] Estevan came with us when we went overseas
translation.zh: 埃斯特万陪我们去了中东地区

translation.en: to the Middle East to meet and perform for the troops.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万陪我们去了中东地区 去给部队做慰问演出

translation.en: [Travis] When we got to Iraq, everyone was kind of shook about going there
translation.zh: 我们到伊拉克时 大家都有点紧张

translation.en: 'cause the war had just started.
translation.zh: 因为战争刚刚打响

translation.en: I don't have any idea what to expect.
translation.zh: 我不知道该抱怎样的期望

translation.en: I'm just going in, having this adventure. It's really cool.
translation.zh: 只是去到那里进行这场冒险就很酷了

translation.en: It was scary,
translation.zh: 那次经历很可怕

translation.en: it was hot, it was dusty.
translation.zh: 气候炎热 尘土四起

translation.en: It was like five or six days
translation.zh: 感觉在那五六天的时间里

translation.en: of being transported to an entirely different world.
translation.zh: 我们被带到了一个完全不同的世界

translation.en: It's like a movie.
translation.zh: 像电影里一样

translation.en: [Mark] We were on a nuclear submarine
translation.zh: 我们登上了一艘核潜艇

translation.en: literally crawling in the torpedo tubes.
translation.zh: 真的是直接在鱼雷管里爬行

translation.en: [Travis] So that whole trip was fireworks. It was scary as fuck.
translation.zh: 那次旅程太精彩了 特他妈恐怖

translation.en: It was definitely an eye-opening experience.
translation.zh: 但绝对是让人大开眼界的经历

translation.en: Travis, what's your job, Travis?
translation.zh: 特拉维斯 你是干什么的？

translation.en: -I play the drums. -Drummer, all right. How are you?
translation.zh: 我是鼓手 你是鼓手啊 你好吗？

translation.en: Don't hit the torpedo buttons.
translation.zh: 不要按鱼雷发射键

translation.en: [Mark] You fire torpedoes? You shot one?
translation.zh: -发射鱼雷 -你发射过吗？

translation.en: -I shot one. -[Mark] Cool.
translation.zh: -我发射过 -真酷

translation.en: We were in a marine forward base on the border of Iraq.
translation.zh: 我们在伊拉克边境的 一个海军陆战队前沿基地

translation.en: [man] We got Blink-182 in the house!
translation.zh: 闪亮182来看我们了

translation.en: -[man] Don't turn the key on. -[Travis] I won't.
translation.zh: -别开发动机哦 -不会的

translation.en: I guess things were getting heated,
translation.zh: 可能局势变得紧张了

translation.en: so we took a COD plane
translation.zh: 所以我们搭了一架运输飞机

translation.en: that boomeranged us off of the aircraft carrier.
translation.zh: 从航空母舰上把我们射了出去

translation.en: [Mark] But it was insane. I was really glad that he was there to get those photos.
translation.zh: 那真是很疯狂 我很庆幸他能在现场拍下那些照片

translation.en: As a lot of photographers were breaking into digital photography,
translation.zh: 当时很多摄影师开始涉足数码摄影

translation.en: Estevan stuck to film
translation.zh: 但埃斯特万坚持用胶卷拍摄

translation.en: and the development process.
translation.zh: 用传统的方法洗照片

translation.en: Because it's grainy and it looks like film,
translation.zh: 因为照片的颗粒感和电影质感

translation.en: it's a document of one specific moment.
translation.zh: 它们记录了各个独特的瞬间

translation.en: Before you know it, you know, Estevan was doing more directing.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万很快开始尝试 更多的导演工作

translation.en: Started to do mad videos for everybody.
translation.zh: 我开始给大伙儿拍劲爆的音乐录影带

translation.en: ♪ Hold you down ♪
translation.zh: （炼金士和妮娜双子星 《压住你》）

translation.en: [Eminem] Estevan did the first D12 video we ever shot.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万拍了D12的首支录影带

translation.en: It was supposed to be a gritty, grimy-looking video,
translation.zh: 我们原本就想要一个 有颗粒感和粗糙感的录影带

translation.en: and Estevan captured that perfectly.
translation.zh: 我们原本就想要一个 有颗粒感和粗糙感的录影带 埃斯特万拍得非常到位

translation.en: I know we shot the outside of the house, the Dresden house,
translation.zh: 我知道我们 在德雷斯顿的房子外面拍过

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure we shot the inside of it too.
translation.zh: 我知道我们 在德雷斯顿的房子外面拍过 我相当肯定我们还进屋拍了

translation.en: I'm like, "Yeah, that's the bathroom."
translation.zh: 我还说：“对 那是卫生间”

translation.en: It wasn't really a lot of fun dressing up...
translation.zh: 扮装并没有特别好玩

translation.en: like Richard Simmons.
translation.zh: 我扮的是理查德西蒙斯

translation.en: But, hey, man, at that point in time, I was doing whatever it took.
translation.zh: 不过在那个时候 我是在尽我所能

translation.en: He directed a couple of Cypress videos.
translation.zh: 他执导了几支柏树山的录影带

translation.en: ♪ Hello, my name is Dr. Greenthumb ♪
translation.zh: （柏树山 《绿拇指医生》）

translation.en: ♪ Hello, my name is Dr. Greenthumb ♪
translation.zh: （柏树山 《绿拇指医生》） （导演：埃斯特万奥里奥尔）

translation.en: ♪ I'd like to tell you... ♪
translation.zh: （导演：埃斯特万奥里奥尔）

translation.en: [Sen] You know, we had the same ideas, we grew up in the same part of the planet,
translation.zh: 我们有同样的理念 在同一个地方长大

translation.en: so it wasn't hard for him to know what we were gonna like
translation.zh: 所以他不难明白我们喜欢的东西

translation.en: and what we wanted to see in our videos. ♪ Hello, my name is Dr. Greenthumb ♪
translation.zh: 以及我们想要在录影带里呈现的东西

translation.en: And then, when we went down to Mexico City, in DF,
translation.zh: 然后我们去墨西哥城 即联邦首都的时候

translation.en: we had thousands and thousands of kids following us on the street that day,
translation.zh: 那天有数千个孩子在街上跟着我们

translation.en: and in the midst of it all, Estevan was on point the whole time with the camera, you know.
translation.zh: 在这整个过程中 埃斯特万一直非常精准地掌镜

translation.en: [Roger] He understood what made a good story and he understood what was authentic.
translation.zh: 他知道如何营造故事感和真实感

translation.en: I like that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: I'll tell you when, just keep the light on him
translation.zh: 时机到了我会告诉你 你就一直给他打灯

translation.en: so when I sweep back around--
translation.zh: 然后当我横扫镜头时…

translation.en: [Mark] With this video, it was an idea that was thought out by the director, Estevan Oriol.
translation.zh: 这个录影带的概念是由 导演埃斯特万奥里奥尔构想的

translation.en: He directed this video that really shook everything up.
translation.zh: 他执导的这支录影带影响力很大

translation.en: It was really like, "What in the world?"
translation.zh: 让人惊叹：“这也太猛了吧！” 真的很棒

translation.en: Like it's the real deal.
[Mark] Having him come in and direct a video for us
translation.zh: 有他过来帮我们执导音乐录影带

translation.en: just, I don't know, brought a really element of cool
translation.zh: 带来了一种非常酷的感觉

translation.en: that I think was really ahead of its time.
translation.zh: 我觉得非常超前

translation.en: That shit was, like, really amazing. Just the way he-- His style.
translation.zh: 那玩意儿真的很棒 他的风格很出众

translation.en: [Travis] The "Down" video was fun. It was the first time I ever met Trigz.
translation.zh: 拍《消沉》的录影带很好玩 那是我第一次见到崔格斯

translation.en: It was I think the first time we ever brought Mark and Tom to the hood.
translation.zh: 那次好像是我们第一次 带马克和汤姆来这种地方

translation.en: [chuckling] I think they were tripping a little bit.
translation.zh: 我感觉他们有点紧张

translation.en: [Terry] He put me in the Blink-182 video. As a cop.
translation.zh: 他让我在闪亮182的录影带里演警察

translation.en: What I loved was the authenticity.
translation.zh: 我很爱那种真实感

translation.en: Here was an example of the culture needing another voice.
translation.zh: 它代表我们的文化需要另一种声音

translation.en: Here I was this cop after this guy,
translation.zh: 我扮演一个追逐逃犯的警察

translation.en: he's on the run, and there was a helicopter.
translation.zh: 我扮演一个追逐逃犯的警察 还有直升机 又是在洛杉矶盆地拍的

translation.en: You know, shot in the LA Basin and...
translation.zh: 还有直升机 又是在洛杉矶盆地拍的

translation.en: There were people in the video that looked like for real LA.
translation.zh: 参演的人真的像是纯正的洛杉矶人

translation.en: [Travis] But that was fun, man, that video came out so cool and it had...
translation.zh: 那次真的很有趣 录影带的效果很好 和我们以前的作品有很不一样的氛围

translation.en: just a different energy than anything we ever did and...
translation.zh: 和我们以前的作品有很不一样的氛围

translation.en: Estevan just really killed the visual.
translation.zh: 埃斯特万对视觉的处理简直是绝了

translation.en: [Estevan] You ready? Let's set up the shot.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？ 我们来布置一下

translation.en: [producer] Are you gonna sit on the chair?
translation.zh: 你要坐在椅子上吗？

translation.en: -[Estevan] Can I direct? -[producer] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 能让我来指导吗？ -好的 -你别跟着我拍

translation.en: Don't follow me. You're gonna be on the shot.
translation.zh: -好的 -你别跟着我拍 不然你会在镜头里

translation.en: -[producer] Tell me what you're gonna do. -I'm gonna make a documentary
translation.zh: 我要拍个纪录片

translation.en: and talk about the Sixth Street Bridge.
translation.zh: 我们要谈谈第六街大桥

translation.en: -Ready? -[producer] Yes.
translation.zh: -好了吗？ -好了

translation.en: Okay, so, we're sitting right here
translation.zh: 好的 我现在坐着的位置

translation.en: at what was formerly known as the Sixth Street Bridge.
translation.zh: 是以前的第六街大桥的遗址

translation.en: So you see these pieces right here?
translation.zh: 你看到这些部分了吗？

translation.en: There was two arches. They were part of the bridge.
translation.zh: 以前有两个圆拱 是桥的一部分 这是它们现在的模样

translation.en: That's them now.
translation.zh: 是桥的一部分 这是它们现在的模样

translation.en: I have 20 years of photos
translation.zh: 我在这里拍了20年的照片

translation.en: of this street
translation.zh: 记录了这条街道

translation.en: and where this bridge was, and that bridge.
translation.zh: 还有那座桥以前和现在的模样

translation.en: And they're gonna redo it.
translation.zh: 他们会进行重建

translation.en: They're gonna have a poodle park here,
translation.zh: 在这儿建一个遛狗的公园

translation.en: a cappuccino bar, a juice bar.
translation.zh: 还有卡布奇诺吧、果汁吧

translation.en: This whole area is changing.
translation.zh: 这一整片区域都会改变

translation.en: [Estevan] This was the access way to the LA River.
translation.zh: 这以前是通向洛杉矶河的通道

translation.en: And this was like our playground, our stomping ground.
translation.zh: 这里是我们的游乐场 我们经常来的地方

translation.en: I had a lot of good photo shoots here, a lot of good times.
translation.zh: 我在这里拍过很多好照片 有很多美好的时光

translation.en: Get it out of the street.
translation.zh: 离开这条街

translation.en: [Estevan] I was shooting a lot of women, gangsters, and lowriders,
translation.zh: 我给很多女人 帮派分子和趴地跳跳车拍过照

translation.en: 'cause, you know, that's what I was around.
translation.zh: 因为那就是我的圈子

translation.en: [Estevan] I don't know what it is about California, man.
translation.zh: 我真是不明白加州是怎么回事

translation.en: Don't let the palm trees and the white picket fences fool you.
translation.zh: 别被棕榈树和白色栅栏给骗了

translation.en: There's wrought iron on the windows
translation.zh: 窗户上有铁艺护栏

translation.en: and the murder rate is through the roof, you know.
translation.zh: 谋杀率高得离谱 你知道吗？

translation.en: [Estevan] I was shooting this girl that was a gang member.
translation.zh: 我正在给一个姑娘拍照 这时过来了一个帮派分子

translation.en: She just threw up LA.
translation.zh: 她就用手比了LA

translation.en: [Baldacci] LA, baby.
translation.zh: LA 耶

translation.en: And I went in and just took two frames of the LA.
translation.zh: 我马上靠上去对着手势闪了两张

translation.en: He caught it first. A lot of the photographers
translation.zh: 他率先捕捉到了 很多摄像师不懂一些手势的特殊语言

translation.en: didn't know some of that type of finger lingo, if you will, you know,
translation.zh: 很多摄像师不懂一些手势的特殊语言

translation.en: when you throw up the West Coast
translation.zh: 比如你用手比“西海岸”或是“洛杉矶”

translation.en: or you throw up LA, whatever clique you're from.
translation.zh: 比如你用手比“西海岸”或是“洛杉矶” 不管你是哪个团伙的

translation.en: A lot of people didn't wanna use that photo.
translation.zh: 很多人不想用那张照片 （埃斯特万的妻子）

translation.en: They said it was too gang-related.
translation.zh: 他们说太有帮派气了

translation.en: [Estevan] At that time,
translation.zh: 在那个时候

translation.en: if the wrong person saw you doing that,
translation.zh: 如果你遇上看不惯你比那个手势的人

translation.en: you'd get beat up, or shot at or fucking stabbed.
translation.zh: 你可能被殴打 被枪击 或他妈的挨刀子

translation.en: Throwing up the L and the A like that,
translation.zh: 像这样比LA的手势

translation.en: that was something that we did back in the day.
translation.zh: 那是我们以前会做的

translation.en: [B-Real] And that was the first representation of it.
translation.zh: 而那是第一次被镜头呈现出来

translation.en: [Sen] Now it's a global thing where kids in other countries
translation.zh: 现在这成了全球性的东西 有其他国家的年轻人会给我发 他们比这个手势的照片

translation.en: send me pictures of them throwing up that sign.
translation.zh: 有其他国家的年轻人会给我发 他们比这个手势的照片

translation.en: That's pretty cool, man. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 这挺酷的 你懂吗？

translation.en: His LA hands photo?
translation.zh: 他的那张LA手势照

translation.en: That's Estevan.
translation.zh: 那就是埃斯特万

translation.en: That shit's been copied so much.
translation.zh: 那玩意儿被各种模仿

translation.en: So many times. Ripped off.
translation.zh: 各种剽窃层出不穷

translation.en: Many have tried to bite it.
translation.zh: 很多人盗过图

translation.en: [Pat] I see the LA hands, and I know it's a bootleg.
translation.zh: 我看到LA手势就知道那是剽窃

translation.en: Starbucks is ripping him off. Gosh!
translation.zh: 星巴克也在剽窃他 天啊 H&M也是直接盗用艺术家的图像

translation.en: The H&M thing? To steal from artists like that, their images.
translation.zh: 天啊 H&M也是直接盗用艺术家的图像

translation.en: They have it on T-shirts.
translation.zh: T恤衫上有

translation.en: [chuckling] The LA symbol's notorious.
translation.zh: 这个LA手势可谓臭名昭著

translation.en: [Estevan] Everybody, you know, and their mom, was doing it.
translation.zh: 每个人都在比 他们的妈妈也比

translation.en: -[Angel Baby] The Mayor's throwing it up. -Boom!
translation.zh: 我们的市长也在比

translation.en: People gonna copy it, people gonna try it, but we all know where it came from.
translation.zh: 人们会不断模仿和尝试 但我们都知道它的起源在哪儿

translation.en: I advise everybody to dig into the roots of anything they do
translation.zh: 我建议各位不管在做什么 都要追根溯源

translation.en: and see where it came from and pay homage to the person before them.
translation.zh: 看它的源头在哪儿 向走在他们前面的先锋致敬

translation.en: [B-Real] It was iconic. It's an iconic picture.
translation.zh: 那太有标志性了 那是一张标志性的照片

translation.en: [Cartoon] One of the things that is there with Chicano art is violence,
translation.zh: 奇卡诺艺术的一个主题就是暴力

translation.en: is poverty,
translation.zh: 贫穷

translation.en: is addiction,
translation.zh: 毒瘾

translation.en: alcoholism.
translation.zh: 酗酒

translation.en: [Lepke] When I met Estevan, I was struggling through a lot of relapses.
translation.zh: 我认识埃斯特万的时候 我的毒瘾多次复发

translation.en: We were in a motel, and I called Estevan. I go, "Hey, I'm on a good one, man.
translation.zh: 我们在汽车旅馆 我打给埃斯特万说： “我现在正起劲呢”

translation.en: You wanna film some footage? So why don't you come on through,
translation.zh: 他想要拍点素材 我就让他现在过来 因为我们现在正嗨得起劲

translation.en: because we got it going on real good right here."
translation.zh: 我就让他现在过来 因为我们现在正嗨得起劲

translation.en: I had every drug in my system, 'cause I don't discriminate.
translation.zh: 我体内有各种毒品 因为我不搞歧视

translation.en: I just went on a binge.
translation.zh: 我就是猛嗑了一顿 纯粹的猛嗑

translation.en: A simple binge. Everybody does it once in a while.
translation.zh: 我就是猛嗑了一顿 纯粹的猛嗑 每个人都偶尔会这样

translation.en: You know, some people binge on donuts. Some people binge on heroin.
translation.zh: 有的人会猛吃甜甜圈 有的人会猛打海洛因

translation.en: This is some new shit I came across.
translation.zh: 这是我刚接触到的新玩意儿

translation.en: These are five-dollar bolsas.
translation.zh: 这些是五美元一包

translation.en: I love it. There's no excuse.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 我不会找借口

translation.en: I love to get high on this. I love the feeling I get from it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢靠这个嗨 喜欢它给我的感觉

translation.en: If you don't cook it right, it fucks your stomach good.
translation.zh: 如果你加热不当 你肠胃会他妈乱套

translation.en: This is the picture they took of the heroin
translation.zh: 这就是他们拍的照片 这是已经对我失效了的海洛因

translation.en: that wasn't getting me high no more with the syringe, the crack pipe,
translation.zh: 这是已经对我失效了的海洛因 还有注射器、吸可卡因的管子

translation.en: and I don't know why I had the nail clipper there.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么旁边有个指甲刀

translation.en: God only knows, right?
translation.zh: 这个只有天知道吧

translation.en: Estevan could take me into the lab
translation.zh: 如果埃斯特万带我去摄影工作室

translation.en: and pull out all these pictures and I'll go,
translation.zh: 然后把这些照片给我看

translation.en: "What the fuck? Are you serious, bro?"
translation.zh: 我会说：“这他妈什么鬼？ 你是认真的吗 老兄？”

translation.en: I looked like an Ethiopian research monkey.
translation.zh: 我看起来像一个埃塞俄比亚的实验猴

translation.en: I don't even know why I'm alive today.
translation.zh: 我都不知道我怎么会活到今天

translation.en: For some good reason, the good Lord didn't drop me and put me on my back.
translation.zh: 出于某种原因 慈悲的上帝没有丢下我 让我挂掉

translation.en: Sometimes, I sell real shit. Sometimes--
translation.zh: 有时候我卖的是真玩意儿 有时候…

translation.en: And I was in a bad stage right here.
translation.zh: 当时我的状态很不好

translation.en: And those are balloons of heroin in my mouth.
translation.zh: 我嘴里含着海洛因胶囊

translation.en: I sell fake shit. All this is fake.
translation.zh: 这他妈全是假的 都是假的

translation.en: This is all fake.
translation.zh: 这全是假的

translation.en: Either way, this is getting sold, all right?
translation.zh: 但不管怎样都要卖出去 好吗？

translation.en: Because, see, you can't buy drugs on the street.
translation.zh: 因为你不能在街上买毒 那是违法的

translation.en: That's illegal. You can't sell them. It's illegal.
translation.zh: 因为你不能在街上买毒 那是违法的 也不能贩毒 那也是违法的 这里面没毒品 好吧？

translation.en: There's no drugs in here. So it's a bungle case.
translation.zh: 也不能贩毒 那也是违法的 这里面没毒品 好吧？ 这是骗人的

translation.en: So the proof is in the pudding, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 所以东西好不好 要吃了才知道

translation.en: [Scott] If you wanna know the real street culture
translation.zh: 如果你想了解真正的街头文化和生活

translation.en: and that street life, open one of Estevan's books.
translation.zh: 如果你想了解真正的街头文化和生活 翻开埃斯特万的摄影集吧

translation.en: And this is where it leads to. Everything leads to this picture.
translation.zh: 所有这一切的后果就是这张照片

translation.en: This is 2003,
translation.zh: 这是在2003年

translation.en: July 9th or 8th, I believe.
translation.zh: 应该是7月9号或8号吧

translation.en: I got shot in front of the Econo Lodge hotel.
translation.zh: 我在伊康诺旅馆前挨了枪

translation.en: From where you're at, from where the camera's at, they shot me six times.
translation.zh: 就是从你和摄像机的位置 他们射了我六枪

translation.en: [Lepke] I took five bullets there. And they came and told me I didn't have insurance,
translation.zh: 我中了五枪 然后医院说我没有保险

translation.en: so five days after that, I walked out, caught walking pneumonia, almost died,
translation.zh: 所以五天之后我就出走了 患上了轻度肺炎 差点死了

translation.en: and then went back and had to stay another additional 30 days.
translation.zh: 又回了医院 然后在那儿又待了30天

translation.en: See? Karma hits, 'cause I was supposed to be doing Estevan a favor
translation.zh: 你看吧？这就是报应 因为我本来要帮埃斯特给一个人搬家

translation.en: and moving somebody.
translation.zh: 因为我本来要帮埃斯特给一个人搬家

translation.en: See how that works?
translation.zh: 结果你看怎么着？

translation.en: [Cartoon] The '90s were very, very violent.
translation.zh: 90年代是很暴力的

translation.en: You saw the peak of gang violence.
translation.zh: 那时候帮派冲突到达顶峰

translation.en: You saw people that were there that seen enemies they didn't like,
translation.zh: 有的人一遇到看不顺眼的敌人

translation.en: they just took off on them right there.
translation.zh: 他们就当场用暴力解决

translation.en: You could hear the bullets going by. [imitates bullets]
translation.zh: 你可以听见子弹飞过的声音

translation.en: They were trying to stop here, homie. They were coming too fast.
translation.zh: 他们本来想停在那儿 但他们过来得太快了

translation.en: So they stopped right here. And they went just like, "Hey, homie."
translation.zh: 所以他们就停在这儿了 然后他们说：“喂 哥们儿！”

translation.en: Man! [imitates gunshot] I hit the floor quick, eh.
translation.zh: 天啊 我立刻就往地上躲

translation.en: [Estevan] Why were they shooting at you?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们为什么朝你开枪？

translation.en: [man] See, this is a black neighborhood, right?
translation.zh: 这是个黑人区 对吧？

translation.en: I guess they're going at it with a Hispanic gang over there.
translation.zh: 我猜他们和那边的拉丁裔帮派在对打

translation.en: You know what I mean? Look at me, dog.
translation.zh: 你看看我的样貌就明白了

translation.en: -[man] Look right here, homie. -[man 2] Yeah.
translation.zh: 你能看向这边吗？

translation.en: You like that.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧

translation.en: Right there, West Los.
translation.zh: 嘿 西洛杉矶

translation.en: School of hard knocks.
translation.zh: 社会教我成长

translation.en: Sometimes hard rocks.
translation.zh: 有时可卡因也能

translation.en: Hard knocks and cooked rocks.
translation.zh: 在社会上吃苦 来点可卡因

translation.en: From stealin' and dealin' to rollin' and chillin'.
translation.zh: 偷抢贩毒 拉帮结派

translation.en: [man] My eagle right here, 'cause I'm Mexican-American.
translation.zh: 在这儿刺老鹰是因为我是墨裔美国人

translation.en: I'm American-made, Mexican descent.
translation.zh: 我是美国制造的墨西哥后裔

translation.en: [Speedy] They call me Speedy, one of my fans gave me the name.
translation.zh: 他们叫我斯彼迪 是我一个朋友起的

translation.en: [Baldacci] In there, the tattoo shop is your cell.
translation.zh: 在监狱里 你的牢房就是纹身店

translation.en: Just a couple of cases of soups and coffee, man, from prison.
translation.zh: 送几箱监狱的汤和咖啡

translation.en: That's what they charge you in there to do this type of thing.
translation.zh: 那就是你为纹身支付的报酬

translation.en: Nowadays I guess that's just a way to look cool, but...
translation.zh: 现在这只是一种耍酷的方式罢了

translation.en: All these tattoos right here? They were basically earned,
translation.zh: 但我身上的这些纹身都是我挣来的

translation.en: they were basically put on me for a reason.
translation.zh: 它们刺在我身上都是有理由的

translation.en: [Johnny] All my tattoos were done in prison, single needle.
translation.zh: 我所有的纹身 都是在监狱里刺的单针纹身

translation.en: Never got tattooed in a shop.
translation.zh: 我从没去纹身店刺过

translation.en: They were kind of like the old black and gray feel to the ink.
translation.zh: （约翰尼 音乐制作人） 这有种复古的黑灰刺青的感觉
