translation.en: Some tattoos that some people have, they put them on
translation.zh: 有些人身上的一些纹身 可能是因为他们的生活方式 涉及人的死亡

translation.en: because maybe they were in a lifestyle where a life was lost.
translation.zh: 可能是因为他们的生活方式 涉及人的死亡

translation.en: Not to say that they took the life,
translation.zh: 我不是说那些人是因他们而死

translation.en: because we're not gonna say that 'cause we're on camera.
translation.zh: 因为我们不能当着摄像机这么说

translation.en: When I sleeve somebody, they can't go into regular society,
translation.zh: 我给人刺满整个手臂后 他们无法融入普通社会

translation.en: but little by little, those people will be business owners.
translation.zh: 但是渐渐地 这些人会经商创业 （先锋制作公司）

translation.en: You know, over the next 10, 20 years, those people that are getting sleeves
translation.zh: 在接下来的10到20年中 手臂刺满纹身的人会成为企业主

translation.en: will be business owners and shit will change up for them.
translation.zh: 手臂刺满纹身的人会成为企业主 他们的狗屁境遇会有所改变

translation.en: [Lepke] That's okay. It's a trend now. We got the soccer moms putting tattoos on.
translation.zh: 没关系 这已经是种风潮了 连接送小孩练球的妈妈都有纹身了

translation.en: They're doing shit that we were looked down on.
translation.zh: 这些玩意儿以前让我们受尽歧视

translation.en: We were putting these tattoos 'cause we were outcasts,
translation.zh: 我们刺纹身是因为我们是被驱逐的人

translation.en: because society rejected us.
translation.zh: 因为社会排斥了我们

translation.en: Now they're putting them on because now society accepts it?
translation.zh: 现在社会接受了 他们便纷纷纹身？

translation.en: So now I might just start taking them all off.
translation.zh: 那我干脆把这些都洗掉算了

translation.en: [Cartoon] We're interested in the darkest shit in life.
translation.zh: 我们着眼于生活中最黑暗的破事儿

translation.en: Ghetto bird in the sky...
translation.zh: 警方的监控直升机

translation.en: homeless shit and drug addicts.
translation.zh: 流浪汉和瘾君子

translation.en: Watching and observing those cultures, you know what I mean?
translation.zh: 我们观察着这些文化 懂我意思吗？

translation.en: What happened to your hand? You got arthritis?
translation.zh: 你的手怎么了？ 你有关节炎吗？

translation.en: No, I-- My ex-boyfriend broke it.
translation.zh: （蕾吉娜 贫民窟居民） 不 是被我前男友打断的

translation.en: [Estevan] Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 哦 这样啊

translation.en: Okay, look, if you go out this way, and go on the side,
translation.zh: 听着 你从这边出去 然后去那边

translation.en: go straight all the way down, there's a little alley right there.
translation.zh: 一路直走 那儿有一个小巷子

translation.en: [Estevan] I'll go check it out.
translation.zh: 那儿有一个小巷子 行 我们去看看

translation.en: -Take it easy. -[producer] Bye, thank you.
translation.zh: -好的 多保重 -谢谢你

translation.en: [Estevan] When you're in the streets in LA, in the bad neighborhoods,
translation.zh: 当你走在洛杉矶风气不好的区域时

translation.en: it's like your blood is flowing, the adrenaline is there.
translation.zh: 你会感觉血脉偾张 肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: When you know that it's an active area and some shit might happen,
translation.zh: 你知道这个地方常有暴力发生 可能会遇上破事儿

translation.en: it's kind of like, okay, cool, you know, you gotta be on point, you know.
translation.zh: 那行 你得随时保持警惕 眼神得放利索了 注意周边动静

translation.en: Open the eyes on the back of your head,
translation.zh: 眼神得放利索了 注意周边动静

translation.en: 'cause if you're just walking around all "ladi da, da,"
translation.zh: 因为如果你漫不经心地晃悠

translation.en: you know, like an idiot, you could lose that way.
translation.zh: 像个白痴一样 你可能会完蛋

translation.en: They're just looking for someone to fuck with, so...
translation.zh: 那些人就他妈的想找人麻烦

translation.en: Right here, you know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 你看看这个 懂我意思了吗？

translation.en: Just gotta make sure you're strapped.
translation.zh: 你必须要带上武器

translation.en: [Estevan] A lot of people we've known have died.
translation.zh: 很多我们认识的人都已经死了

translation.en: [Estevan] Can't even think of how that would be if Cartoon passed away.
translation.zh: 我无法想象卡通先生没了会怎么样

translation.en: We've had to make out wills before,
translation.zh: 我们以前立了遗嘱

translation.en: and it was, like, the will went to, like, each other.
translation.zh: 我们是对方的遗嘱执行人

translation.en: We would look out for each other's family.
translation.zh: 我们会照顾彼此的家人

translation.en: Let's see what we have here in this little box.
translation.zh: 我们来看看这个小盒子里有什么

translation.en: This is my friend Mono. He passed away.
translation.zh: 这是我的朋友莫诺 他去世了

translation.en: He's the guy that introduced me and my wife to each other.
translation.zh: 他是我和我妻子的介绍人

translation.en: [D.P.] Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 哦 是吗？

translation.en: [Estevan] And he introduced Cartoon to his wife.
translation.zh: 他还给卡通先生和他妻子牵了线

translation.en: Right here, this is one of my favorite pictures of all times.
translation.zh: 这张照片是我最喜欢的之一

translation.en: His name was Chato.
translation.zh: 他的名字叫查托

translation.en: Rest in peace. He died.
translation.zh: 愿他安息 他死了

translation.en: Trigz got shot.
translation.zh: 崔格斯被枪杀了

translation.en: He got murdered 'cause he got into a fight with somebody.
translation.zh: 他被杀是因为他和一个人起了争执

translation.en: Rest in peace.
translation.zh: 愿他安息

translation.en: This was another guy that was shot. His name was Nene.
translation.zh: 这个人也挨了子弹 他叫内内

translation.en: I think he got shot 33 times.
translation.zh: 他好像中了33枪

translation.en: -[D.P.] What happened to him? -[Estevan] He died.
translation.zh: 他后来怎么样了？ 他死了

translation.en: You know, I think they're living the life they wanted to
translation.zh: 不 我认为他们过了自己想要的生活

translation.en: and they died doing what they loved doing.
translation.zh: 他们死去时在做他们钟爱的事

translation.en: Those guys were gangsters and they died doing some gangster shit.
translation.zh: 那些人是帮派分子 死时也他妈的在做帮派的事

translation.en: [D.P.] So you think they kind of dig being a gangster. They'd rather do that--
translation.zh: 所以你觉得身为帮派分子 他们宁愿…

translation.en: Yeah, they loved it, or else they wouldn't have been a gangster.
translation.zh: 对 他们很喜欢 不然也不会混帮派

translation.en: ♪ At the gates of hell ♪
translation.zh: （埃里克赖特 上帝比我们更爱他）

translation.en: [Cartoon] That violence, that poverty, that madness,
translation.zh: 那种暴力、那种贫穷、那种疯狂

translation.en: spawned a beautiful art form
translation.zh: 催生出一种美丽的艺术形式

translation.en: of music, and tattoos, and wall murals,
translation.zh: 有音乐、纹身、墙体彩绘

translation.en: pinstripe, and gold leaf.
translation.zh: 细条纹和金叶图案

translation.en: Those guys sitting in cells that will never get out
translation.zh: 那些一辈子都要在牢里度过的家伙

translation.en: helped shape an art form,
translation.zh: 帮助塑造了一种艺术形式

translation.en: this rose out of a crack in the concrete.
translation.zh: 让它从混凝土的裂缝中萌生出来

translation.en: Now you have a new wave of Chicano artists
translation.zh: 现在出现了新一波的奇卡诺艺术家

translation.en: that can focus on Chicano pride.
translation.zh: 他们能着眼于墨裔美国人的自豪感

translation.en: To be Chicano means identifying with your roots.
translation.zh: 身为墨裔美国人意味着不能忘本

translation.en: [David F., Jr] The number one thing is family.
translation.zh: 要把家人摆在第一位

translation.en: It's all about family.
translation.zh: 家人是最重要的

translation.en: [Michelle] You don't really hear about the heart of a Chicano,
translation.zh: 很少有人谈及 墨裔美国人骨子里的东西

translation.en: but you can see it in a lowrider.
translation.zh: 但是一看到趴地跳跳车便能知晓

translation.en: The way we build our cars,
translation.zh: 我们的造车方式

translation.en: they're old Benny's thrown away that we pick up and we shine.
translation.zh: 就像是把别人不要的铜板捡回来擦亮

translation.en: [Michelle] It's almost like watching a Chicano's heart
translation.zh: 感觉就像看着墨裔美国人的内心

translation.en: being poured out onto paint
translation.zh: 通过彩漆宣泄而出

translation.en: and coating a vehicle with love, you know?
translation.zh: 用爱让一辆车焕然一新

translation.en: [Javi] Those people that threw them away wish they had them back
translation.zh: 那些丢弃这些车的人后悔不已

translation.en: after they see them all fixed up and clean and shined up.
translation.zh: 因为他们看到这些车被重新修好擦亮

translation.en: You don't own a lowrider. You are a lowrider.
translation.zh: 趴地跳跳车不是一个物件 而是一个身份

translation.en: Promoting a great culture in America.
translation.zh: 在美国推广了一种伟大的文化

translation.en: There are people that are incredibly wealthy
translation.zh: 有些非常富有的人

translation.en: that actually know the culture
translation.zh: 真正地懂得这一文化

translation.en: and are admirers of the culture.
translation.zh: 并且尊崇这一文化

translation.en: [Bobo] The culture grew to places like Japan, Europe, South America.
translation.zh: 该文化被推广到了 日本、欧洲、南美等地

translation.en: They introduced the whole rest of the world basically
translation.zh: 基本上他们让整个世界了解到了

translation.en: to the East LA esthetic.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶东部的美学

translation.en: [Bobo] You go to Japan and you see some of the Japanese kids
translation.zh: 我们以前在日本看到过一些日本青年

translation.en: dressing like cholos.
translation.zh: 打扮成墨裔匪帮街头风

translation.en: To the T.
translation.zh: 连细节都很到位

translation.en: You would think, they could put on glasses
translation.zh: 你看他们戴上墨镜 穿上一身的行头

translation.en: and have the whole thing and they could look all "Chicanoed-out"
translation.zh: 你看他们戴上墨镜 穿上一身的行头 完全就是一副奇卡诺的样子

translation.en: until they started to speak.
translation.zh: 等他们一开口才露了馅

translation.en: [Wilmer] Asian culture has become obsessed with East LA and lowriding.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶东部和趴地跳跳车 已经风靡于亚洲文化

translation.en: There's a big lowrider scene that's gone around the world.
translation.zh: 全世界都有活跃的趴地跳跳车圈子

translation.en: [man] Because of what Cartoon and Estevan did with Chicano culture
translation.zh: 因为卡通先生和埃斯特万 对奇卡诺文化的贡献

translation.en: and made it so pervasive and popular in Japanese subculture,
translation.zh: 使它在日本亚文化中非常普遍和流行

translation.en: it made it even extra cool back here in the States.
translation.zh: 这又反过来让它在美国更受追捧

translation.en: And I think a lot of it comes from how pioneering these two gentlemen
translation.zh: 我觉得很大一部分归功于 他们二人在文化中的先锋地位

translation.en: have been to the culture.
translation.zh: 他们二人在文化中的先锋地位 （维尔摩瓦尔德拉玛 演员）

translation.en: [Cartoon] We listen to oldies, we listen to Motown-style, classic soul.
translation.zh: 我们听老歌 我们听摩城风格的经典灵魂乐

translation.en: Due to the weather on the West Coast, we wear T-shirts all year long.
translation.zh: 由于西海岸的天气 我们整年都穿T恤衫

translation.en: We invented the white tee, khakis and Dickies,
translation.zh: 我们发明了 白T恤、卡其裤和迪凯思裤

translation.en: that whole look.
translation.zh: 这样的穿衣风格

translation.en: The West Coast grew up wearing Cortez shoes.
translation.zh: 西海岸的人是穿着阿甘鞋长大的

translation.en: This is the staple for the West Coast.
translation.zh: 这是西海岸必不可少的风格元素

translation.en: In the '80s, though, it was like a gang-banging shoe.
translation.zh: 但在80年代 这是帮派分子穿的鞋

translation.en: Like, you wearing that shoe, people asked you, "Where are you from?"
translation.zh: 如果你穿上这鞋 人们会问你是哪个帮派的

translation.en: I had meditated why it was relevant,
translation.zh: 我思考过它为什么这么重要

translation.en: and why it had to be done.
translation.zh: 以及我为什么必须这么做

translation.en: My own Nike, period.
translation.zh: 我要设计自己的耐克鞋

translation.en: And once I got them in,
translation.zh: 合作谈下来之后

translation.en: it was time to drop,
translation.zh: 就该我动笔绘图了

translation.en: "I have to do a Cortez,"
translation.zh: 我必须得做阿甘鞋

translation.en: paying homage to that era,
translation.zh: 向那个时代致敬

translation.en: to the NWA era.
translation.zh: 向NWA嘻哈组的时代致敬

translation.en: When that happened,
translation.zh: 当这件事做成的时候

translation.en: I was like, "Man, this is fucking amazing.
translation.zh: 我心想：“天啊 这太他妈美妙了”

translation.en: I'm gonna design the shoe I grew up wearing."
translation.zh: 我将要给我成长时穿的鞋做设计

translation.en: It'd be like McDonald's calling you, and be like,
translation.zh: 就好像麦当劳打电话给你说：

translation.en: "You're gonna do your own signature Big Mac. Get ready."
translation.zh: “我们想让你来设计经典巨无霸 做好准备吧”

translation.en: Nike is doing a Mister Cartoon shoe?
translation.zh: 耐克要让卡通先生设计鞋子？

translation.en: They're giving you a shoe?
translation.zh: 他们会给你做鞋子？

translation.en: And letting you design it?
translation.zh: 让你来做设计？

translation.en: It's-- It's crazy.
translation.zh: 这太疯狂了

translation.en: There's not a lot of artists out here to have their own Nike shoe.
translation.zh: 拥有自己设计的耐克鞋的艺术家不多

translation.en: [Cartoon] I walk into a business meeting with confidence.
translation.zh: 走进商务会议时 我总是满怀信心

translation.en: I walk in like, "I'm-- The boss is here."
translation.zh: 好像在宣告： “老大驾到了”

translation.en: And you convince the client
translation.zh: 然后你要说服客户

translation.en: that you know what's poppin'.
translation.zh: 你是懂行的

translation.en: This is inspiring to me.
translation.zh: 这让我深受启发

translation.en: I can apply that same philosophy to what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 我可以将同样的理念运用于我的事业

translation.en: My homie did it, I can do it.
translation.zh: “我哥们儿做到了 我也行”

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇 真棒

translation.en: Whoa, Mister Cartoon is completely crossing over to a different level,
translation.zh: 卡通先生已经上升到另一个境界了

translation.en: [Cartoon] I did the LA edition, which was putting the "LA"
translation.zh: 我做了洛杉矶款式的设计 让耐克的钩穿过洛杉矶的LA字样

translation.en: and having the Nike check go through it.
translation.zh: 让耐克的钩穿过洛杉矶的LA字样

translation.en: The next one I did was the Aztec.
translation.zh: 然后我设计了阿兹特克款式

translation.en: This was crazy because here I'm doing an Aztec
translation.zh: 这很疯狂的原因是 我在阿甘鞋上做了阿兹特克设计

translation.en: on a Cortez.
translation.zh: 我在阿甘鞋上做了阿兹特克设计

translation.en: So you have the Spaniards coming to New Spain, which was Mexico,
translation.zh: 当初西班牙人来到了新西班牙 也就是墨西哥

translation.en: to bring disease,
translation.zh: 也就是墨西哥 他们带来了疾病

translation.en: great war between the Spaniards and the Aztecs
translation.zh: 西班牙人和阿兹特克人之间展开大战

translation.en: to create Mexican people.
translation.zh: 他们的后代就是墨西哥人

translation.en: So, I had that on a shoe, which is a little heavy,
translation.zh: 所以我设计了这款鞋子 对鞋子设计来说 这个理念有点沉重 你懂吗？

translation.en: you know what I'm saying? For a shoe design.
translation.zh: 对鞋子设计来说 这个理念有点沉重 你懂吗？

translation.en: And then on the Aztec warrior, I put a brush mustache,
translation.zh: 然后我给阿兹特克战士加了大粗胡子

translation.en: which is representative of the homies now.
translation.zh: 这象征了我的兄弟们现在的模样

translation.en: When it finally went through,
translation.zh: 最后终于做成之后

translation.en: I was blown away.
translation.zh: 我完全被震撼住了

translation.en: I'm surprised every time one of these huge deals goes through.
translation.zh: 每次这种重大的合作做成时 我都很意外

translation.en: So, to balance that,
translation.zh: 所以为了取得平衡

translation.en: it was important that I did outreach.
translation.zh: 走进社区对我很重要

translation.en: Talking to youngsters, explaining to them,
translation.zh: 和年轻人对话 告诉他们：

translation.en: "Look, I went to LA Unified School,
translation.zh: “听着 我上的是洛杉矶联合学校

translation.en: and I designed my own shoe. What would your shoe look like?"
translation.zh: 但我设计了鞋子 你们的鞋子会是什么样？”

translation.en: And I would ask these kids, and they'd get all shy.
translation.zh: 然后我会问这些孩子 他们会很害羞

translation.en: It's beautiful to see that Cartoon can set an example
translation.zh: （米歇尔罗德里格兹 演员） 我很欣慰卡通先生 能成为这些孩子的榜样

translation.en: for these young kids,
translation.zh: 我很欣慰卡通先生 能成为这些孩子的榜样

translation.en: giving kids hope in art.
translation.zh: 让孩子们对追求艺术抱有希望

translation.en: [Cartoon] My goal was to motivate them and get them to think,
translation.zh: 我的目标是激励他们 让他们心想：

translation.en: "Man, if this knucklehead can do it, man, I can design my own shoe."
translation.zh: “如果这个笨蛋都能做到 那我也能设计自己的鞋子”

translation.en: [chuckling] What?
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[Danny chuckles] -Motherfucking premiere of Machete.
translation.zh: 这可是他妈的《弯刀》的首映式

translation.en: Yeah, that was sweet, with the lowriders.
translation.zh: 啊 当时太棒了 有好多趴地跳跳车

translation.en: [Cartoon] Seeing these big Hollywood events.
translation.zh: 每次有这些大型的好莱坞盛典

translation.en: In the back on my mind, I was like,
translation.zh: 我会有这样一个想法：

translation.en: "We can get a team together and do it."
translation.zh: “我们可以组个团队把它搞定”

translation.en: We had the budgets. And we were able to have some power
translation.zh: 我们有足够的资金 动用了一些权势

translation.en: to do some of those events, and it came out dope.
translation.zh: 把这些盛典办出来了 而且效果很赞

translation.en: And it was beautiful, man.
translation.zh: 那真是太美妙了

translation.en: People in the street, happy that somebody's representing.
translation.zh: 街上的人很开心有人代表他们

translation.en: This is a historical moment right here.
translation.zh: 这是一个历史性的时刻

translation.en: We're taking our culture and trying to lift it up.
translation.zh: 我们想要宣传并提升我们的文化

translation.en: [Michelle] It would be hard to be downtown that day
translation.zh: 那天凡是在市中心的人

translation.en: and not feel our presence.
translation.zh: 很难感觉不到我们的存在

translation.en: We here. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们来了！

translation.en: [Cartoon] Damn, man, we're bringing Chicano art into places that it's never been before.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们把奇卡诺艺术带到了 前所未有的境地

translation.en: Shout-out to S.A. Studios. Grand Theft Auto, good looking.
translation.zh: 我要给灵魂刺客工作室点个赞 《侠盗猎车手》做得太好看了

translation.en: GTA is the iconic video game that ended up becoming because of the Estev and Toon.
translation.zh: 《侠盗猎车手》成为经典的电子游戏 要归功于埃斯特万和卡通先生

translation.en: I played Cesar Vialpando.
translation.zh: 他们扮演了塞萨尔维拉潘多

translation.en: [Cartoon] We did all the tattoos, graffiti,
translation.zh: 我们做了里面的纹身、涂鸦

translation.en: murals, liquor store,
translation.zh: 墙体彩绘、酒品专卖店

translation.en: and the Virgen de Guadalupe would be on the side.
translation.zh: 以及街旁的瓜达卢佩圣母像

translation.en: Estevan would take them around to all the sick shit
translation.zh: 埃斯特万会带他到处做疯狂的破事儿

translation.en: and fucking recreate that.
translation.zh: 然后把他妈的重现出来

translation.en: You've been on a trajectory from the bottom-bottom,
translation.zh: 你从最最底层开始

translation.en: and I guess prison, possibly.
translation.zh: 可能监狱算一个吧

translation.en: You got out of that, survived that,
translation.zh: 你爬出了谷底 活了下来

translation.en: and you're on this uphill trajectory of perfecting this art form.
translation.zh: 然后开始走上坡路 来完善这个艺术形式

translation.en: [Cartoon] It was a great time. Record businesses were still going.
translation.zh: 那段时间很棒 唱片行业仍然蓬勃

translation.en: And magazines were popping
translation.zh: 杂志也很火爆

translation.en: and commercials were getting anywhere from 100,000 into the millions.
translation.zh: 广告收益则是十万到数百万不等

translation.en: Then the digital age came.
translation.zh: 然后进入了数码时代…

translation.en: It's over, and the Internet has allowed
translation.zh: 完蛋了 互联网使全球交流成为可能

translation.en: global communication with a lot of people...
translation.zh: 完蛋了 互联网使全球交流成为可能 但是很多人…

translation.en: [anchor] Twenty million people get their music this way.
translation.zh: 两千万人通过这种方式获取音乐

translation.en: -They worst offender is Napster. -Metallica filed a...
translation.zh: 他们认为情况最严重的 是一个叫奈普斯特的网站

translation.en: At that point, S.A. Studios, it was kind of like a barber shop.
translation.zh: 到了那个时候 灵魂刺客工作室 感觉像是个理发店

translation.en: People came by afterward and bullshitted.
translation.zh: 人们下班后就过来聊天打屁

translation.en: That's what S.A. Studios felt like. A bunch of big-ass kids having fun.
translation.zh: 那就是当时的 灵魂刺客工作室给我的感觉 一帮长不大的小孩子在那儿玩乐

translation.en: "What's up, homie?
translation.zh: “你好吗 哥们儿？

translation.en: What you doing, man? What you've been up to?"
translation.zh: 你在干吗呢？在忙什么呢？”

translation.en: It'd be like showing up at a doctor's office.
translation.zh: 就像去看医生一样

translation.en: You're like, "What's up, fool?
translation.zh: 你说：“你怎么了 傻帽？”

translation.en: Yay, man. Wow, you're doing some surgery. What's up?"
translation.zh: 你说：“你怎么了 傻帽？” “哦 你是来做什么手术的吗？”

translation.en: Working on the ice-cream truck.
translation.zh: 我在彩绘一辆冰淇淋车

translation.en: I'm gonna stay here until five, six in the morning.
translation.zh: 我要一直待到早上五六点

translation.en: I'll probably just go crash upstairs.
translation.zh: 我可能就去楼上睡一下

translation.en: A little bit overwhelming for me.
translation.zh: 我有点扛不住了

translation.en: I don't need a lot of people around to do what I do.
translation.zh: 我做的工作不需要有太多人帮我

translation.en: They're changing.
translation.zh: 他们在改变

translation.en: Life's about change.
translation.zh: 人生总是在改变

translation.en: [reporter] After a rare week of gains--
translation.zh: 在罕见增长了一周之后…

translation.en: [reporter 2] Worst one-day losses since 911.
translation.zh: …自911事件以来最大的单日跌幅

translation.en: The stock market fell hard--
translation.zh: 股市狂跌

translation.en: [reporter 3] 533,000--
[reporter 4] Two point six million people--
translation.zh: 260万民众

translation.en: In 2008 there was the depression.
translation.zh: 2008年有一场经济萧条

translation.en: The country just fell apart.
translation.zh: 这个国家一片混乱

translation.en: [reporter 5] Spinning the economy in a vicious cycle,
translation.zh: …经济陷入了恶性循环

translation.en: people losing their jobs,
translation.zh: 人们失业了

translation.en: then falling behind on their mortgages.
translation.zh: 因此无法偿还房贷

translation.en: [Estevan] Magazines shut down, record labels shut down.
translation.zh: 杂志社纷纷关闭 唱片厂牌纷纷关闭

translation.en: [reporter 6] President Obama facing increasing pressure for a new stimulus package.
translation.zh: 奥巴马总统面临越来越大的压力 要求其出台新的刺激方案

translation.en: All the budgets went away.
translation.zh: 所有的预算都没了

translation.en: [reporter 7] Eleven point three trillion dollars.
translation.zh: 11.3万亿美元

translation.en: ...to stabilize the housing market,
translation.zh: 从而稳定房地产市场

translation.en: and help responsible home-owners stay in their homes.
translation.zh: 帮助负责任的房主保住他们的房子

translation.en: That cut at least 75% of my work that was coming in.
translation.zh: 这至少削减了我75%的工作订单

translation.en: S.A. Studios was a certain time.
translation.zh: 灵魂刺客工作室是某个时代的产物

translation.en: Everything evolves, and everything is a moment in time.
translation.zh: 一切都在演变 没有什么会永恒不变

translation.en: [Cartoon] That whole place of downtown LA got over-gentrified in my opinion.
translation.zh: 我认为洛杉矶市中心的 那一整块区域被过度士绅化了

translation.en: It became uncool.
translation.zh: 现在已经不酷了

translation.en: It became very corporate.
translation.zh: 而是变得非常商业化

translation.en: [Roger] If everything always stays the same, how special is it?
translation.zh: 一切一成不变的话 你还会觉得它特别吗？

translation.en: It's about moments.
translation.zh: 这就是个时间点

translation.en: Five years, ten years. However long that moment was.
translation.zh: 不管它是五年、十年还是多久

translation.en: The vibe. Something happened.
translation.zh: 那种氛围发生了改变

translation.en: [David] You have one guy who's in the profession of tattoos,
translation.zh: 其中一个人的专业是刺纹身

translation.en: which has gone from, like, this fringe,
translation.zh: 纹身过去是一种边缘艺术

translation.en: and now I don't know one fucking person who doesn't have a tattoo.
translation.zh: 而现在我他妈就不认识没有纹身的人

translation.en: And then on this side of the spectrum,
translation.zh: 而在另一方面

translation.en: you have photography, which was like this, and now it's, like, nothing.
translation.zh: 过去很热门的摄影已经没什么前景了

translation.en: Both things are symbiotic and feeding off each other.
translation.zh: 这两种艺术形式是共生和相互依存的

translation.en: But one of those things brings in a ton of cash,
translation.zh: 但其中一项可以大赚一笔

translation.en: and the other one, the cash is disappearing.
translation.zh: 而另一项却越来越赚不到钱

translation.en: The tension that must bring between brothers...
translation.zh: 这肯定让兄弟俩的关系紧张了起来

translation.en: Eventually... it was gone.
translation.zh: 最后的结果就是 它没了

translation.en: The last time I'll ever be here.
translation.zh: 这是我最后一次来这里

translation.en: We were here for 13 years.
translation.zh: 我们在这里待了13年

translation.en: We used to call our little thing here "Skid Row's finest"
translation.zh: 我们曾把我们的这个小地方 叫做贫民窟的精华

translation.en: because we were surrounded by the people of Skid Row.
translation.zh: 因为我们周围有很多贫民窟的人 然后就这样了

translation.en: And that's it. It's a wrap.
translation.zh: 因为我们周围有很多贫民窟的人 然后就这样了 现在结束了 灵魂刺客工作室搬离了市中心

translation.en: S.A. Studios. We're out of downtown.
translation.zh: 现在结束了 灵魂刺客工作室搬离了市中心

translation.en: Gone.
translation.zh: 消失了

translation.en: That was probably one of the most challenging times in my life.
translation.zh: 那可能是我一生中 最具挑战性的时刻之一

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: I made it, 'cause I'm a fighter.
translation.zh: 我挺过来了 因为我不会屈服

translation.en: That was it.
translation.zh: 就那样了

translation.en: You got it?
translation.zh: 结束！

translation.en: ♪ About to blow his lid From the pressure ♪
translation.zh: （洛杉矶 男孩女孩俱乐部）

translation.en: [Estevan] To me, LA's the blood pumping through my veins.
translation.zh: 对我来说 洛杉矶是我血管里的血液

translation.en: I love everything about it.
translation.zh: 我深爱它的一切

translation.en: [Estevan] I mean, look at it. How fucking cool is that shit?
translation.zh: 你看看 这玩意儿多他妈酷啊

translation.en: [Estevan] This is where I come and get all my film done right here.
translation.zh: 这就是我摆弄胶卷的地方

translation.en: Wow, I got some good ones.
translation.zh: 哇 这里面有些好素材

translation.en: So, after 13 years, we've now relocated,
translation.zh: 在那里待了13年之后 我们搬了地点

translation.en: and I'm gonna show you the new S.A. Studios.
translation.zh: 我来带你参观新的灵魂刺客工作室

translation.en: Well, my part of it. Cartoon has a different part.
translation.zh: 只是我的区域而已 卡通先生在别的区域

translation.en: So... here we are.
translation.zh: 好了 我们到了

translation.en: S.A. Studios.
translation.zh: 灵魂刺客工作室

translation.en: [Estevan] You can barely fit in here.
translation.zh: 这里几乎容不下我

translation.en: These are the new S.A. Studios.
translation.zh: 这就是新的灵魂刺客工作室

translation.en: These are all bills that haven't been paid.
translation.zh: 这些是还没有支付的账单

translation.en: You know, just so everybody knows
translation.zh: 这样大家就知道了

translation.en: what it's like to be a world-famous photographer.
translation.zh: 当一个世界知名摄影师是什么样的

translation.en: [Cartoon] Where am I today? I'm in a good place.
translation.zh: 我现在的状态挺好的

translation.en: I'm an optimist.
translation.zh: 我是个乐观主义者

translation.en: I'm always gonna look at what's the solution,
translation.zh: 我永远都在想：“怎么解决问题？

translation.en: what do I got to be grateful for,
translation.zh: 我对什么事情心怀感恩？

translation.en: how can I make this pop.
translation.zh: 我要怎么让这个更吸引人？”

translation.en: I haven't stopped one day since S.A. Studios.
translation.zh: 自从有了灵魂刺客工作室 我就一天都没停过

translation.en: I have a private studio right here.
translation.zh: 我在这里有一间私人的工作室

translation.en: I own this property. Can't kick me out.
translation.zh: 这是我的私有房产 没人能赶我走

translation.en: And it's all dialed into my needs, I airbrush the cars in here.
translation.zh: 而且都是按照我的需求设计的 我可以在这里喷绘汽车

translation.en: I've been here for five years now and...
translation.zh: 我在这里待了五年了 我非常喜欢

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢

translation.en: [Estevan, in Spanish] Attention! Attention!
translation.zh: 注意了 注意

translation.en: [in English] There's our lovely Sixth Street Bridge.
translation.zh: 那是我们可爱的第六街大桥

translation.en: [in English] So crazy to see all this shit.
translation.zh: 看到这些真他妈不可思议

translation.en: Fucking changing so fast.
translation.zh: 我操 变化真是太快了

translation.en: This is a mural by my friend Risky.
translation.zh: 这是我朋友瑞思奇画的墙体彩绘

translation.en: Everybody knows Risk.
translation.zh: 大家都知道他

translation.en: This was a parking lot before.
translation.zh: 这以前好像是一个停车场

translation.en: Some metal rinky-dink buildings, and now it's like...
translation.zh: 以前就是些破烂的小楼 而现在…

translation.en: the biggest fucking most...
translation.zh: 这里有最大的… 最他妈什么的…

translation.en: apartments, fuck it, whatever you could get in there.
translation.zh: 公寓楼 反正他妈的什么都有

translation.en: [Cartoon] I don't feel like a victim. I feel like I'm on top of everything.
translation.zh: 我不觉得我是个受害者 我认为一切尽在掌握中

translation.en: I'm on top of social media,
translation.zh: 我知道怎么运用社交媒体

translation.en: I know how to use Photoshop, I know how to use a computer.
translation.zh: 我知道怎么用修图软件 我知道怎么用电脑

translation.en: I taught myself all that.
translation.zh: 这些都是我自学的

translation.en: The guys that didn't do that, they probably feel overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 没有这样做的人可能会觉得措手不及

translation.en: And then I was trying to keep up with the Joneses, and, you know,
translation.zh: 我试着和别人攀比 也试着发各种帖子

translation.en: trying to post--
translation.zh: 也试着发各种帖子

translation.en: I tried all that shit.
translation.zh: 我他妈都试过了

translation.en: I tried to post hot girls, big celebrities, gangster stuff.
translation.zh: 我试过发辣妹、大明星和匪帮的图

translation.en: I tried to post everything
translation.zh: 我什么都试着发过了

translation.en: at certain times a day on certain days and I'm like,
translation.zh: 还计划过哪一天的什么时候发

translation.en: "How the fuck does this guy have a million followers
translation.zh: 结果还是：“他妈的这个人 凭什么有一百万粉丝

translation.en: and I got 115,000 or whatever?" You know?
translation.zh: 而我却只有11万5千之类的？”

translation.en: Every time I'd think I was doing some big shit, good shit,
translation.zh: 每次我自以为我发了很劲爆的东西

translation.en: and I go, "Oh, I'm gonna show Instagram right now. Fuck everybody."
translation.zh: 心想：“现在Instagram 会知道我的厉害了 所有人都滚蛋”

translation.en: You know. "All my haters are gonna come out on this one."
translation.zh: “我所有的黑粉都会恨得牙痒痒”

translation.en: I would post something and it'd be like, "wah, wah, wah."
translation.zh: 我发了之后 结果…

translation.en: And I was like, "Man."
translation.zh: 然后我心想：“天啊

translation.en: I got more likes just from taking a picture of my dog with my iPhone or something, you know.
translation.zh: 我用手机 拍我家狗的照片都比这个点赞多”

translation.en: All the algorithms and the analytics and all that, and I was like,
translation.zh: 还有那些算法、流量分析那些

translation.en: "Man, this shit is, like, so time-consuming and overwhelming."
translation.zh: 这些玩意儿真是很费时间又很复杂

translation.en: It's tiring to try and keep up with the Joneses, so...
translation.zh: 和别人攀比真的很累

translation.en: Sometimes I just say, "Fuck it, who am I doing all this shit--?"
translation.zh: 所以有时我想：“操他妈的 我凭什么要做这些破事？”

translation.en: And I go and, you know, do work that I need to be doing, to...
translation.zh: 然后我就去埋头工作 这样才能…

translation.en: To keep the-- keep the...
translation.zh: 保证…

translation.en: the checks coming in, to keep up with the bills that are coming in.
translation.zh: 我有收入 能够支付涌来的账单

translation.en: [Cartoon] People on the other side of the world looking at our shit,
translation.zh: 世界另一端的人在关注我们的玩意儿

translation.en: we don't realize a lot of times 'cause it's in front of us.
translation.zh: 我们时常意识不到 因为它近在眼前

translation.en: We're from Berlin.
translation.zh: 我们是从柏林来的

translation.en: We're driving lowriders.
translation.zh: 我们开着趴地跳跳车

translation.en: We wear that clothing stuff and...
translation.zh: （疯狂比尔 游客） 我们会学着打扮 也听音乐

translation.en: listen to the music.
translation.zh: 我们会学着打扮 也听音乐

translation.en: Latino life.
translation.zh: 拉丁风的生活

translation.en: [Cartoon] I think that this art form embraces everybody.
translation.zh: 我认为这一艺术形式包容每一个人

translation.en: People are affected, and we don't know about it.
translation.zh: 人们被它影响着 而我们却不知道

translation.en: Inside I always looked like a cholo.
translation.zh: 我的内心永远是墨裔匪帮街头风

translation.en: I'm a trans man and I'm tattooed. I love tattoos.
translation.zh: 我是变性男人 我有纹身 我很爱纹身

translation.en: -[Loco] Yeah? Good? -[man] Danke schön.
translation.zh: -它们很棒 -是的

translation.en: [passerby] All good, bro bro!
translation.zh: 很棒哦 老兄！

translation.en: [Chris] Oh, I've been arrested over 20 times for graffiti.
translation.zh: 我因为涂鸦被抓过20多次

translation.en: And I've been chased with things and attacked by dogs
translation.zh: 我被人拿东西追过 被狗攻击过

translation.en: and my leg-- ripped my leg open over jumping fences.
translation.zh: 在翻栅栏时在腿上划了一个大口子

translation.en: But I love it.
translation.zh: 可是我喜欢

translation.en: Watching Estevan's photos and Cartoon's tattoos
translation.zh: 埃斯特万的摄影和卡通先生的纹身

translation.en: put me into an understanding about a lot of things out here.
translation.zh: 让我理解了这里的很多东西

translation.en: -[man] Oh! -That was perfect timing.
translation.zh: -里面的人出来了 -时间刚刚好

translation.en: [Mark] Between Estevan and Cartoon, they have really brought
translation.zh: 埃斯特万和卡通先生二人 真正地把洛杉矶市中心的文化

translation.en: the culture of downtown Los Angeles
translation.zh: 真正地把洛杉矶市中心的文化

translation.en: to a place of respect and high art.
translation.zh: 提升到了崇高和高雅艺术的地位

translation.en: [Roger] For this show, we wanted to be true to the spirit of the artform.
translation.zh: 在这个展览中 我们想要忠于这一艺术形式的精神

translation.en: Vandalism, ambition, rebellion, being out in the streets.
translation.zh: 涂鸦乱画、野心、反叛和浪迹街头

translation.en: [Mark] Beyond The Streets show that's out now,
translation.zh: 现在正在进行的《街头之外》展览

translation.en: you have Banksy, Basquiat,
translation.zh: 包括班克斯、巴斯奎特

translation.en: Murakami, Shepard Fairey.
translation.zh: 村上隆、舒帕德法利的作品

translation.en: And then you also have Cartoon's church,
translation.zh: 也有卡通先生创作的教堂

translation.en: and you have the iconic Estevan LA hand sign.
translation.zh: 以及经典的埃斯特万的LA手势

translation.en: [Martha] People might dismiss graffiti as only being vandalism.
translation.zh: 人们可能认为涂鸦只是一种破坏行为

translation.en: And I'm not saying that it isn't vandalism.
translation.zh: 我并不是说这不是破坏行为

translation.en: It is vandalism.
translation.zh: 这就是破坏行为

translation.en: [Cartoon] This is vandal art. Carving your name in a toilet
translation.zh: 这是破坏艺术 就是把名字刻在马桶上之类的破事

translation.en: and shit. That's how people look at it.
translation.zh: 这就是人们的观点

translation.en: We're not even supposed to be there in the first place
translation.zh: 我们压根就不应该在这里

translation.en: or have our cars in there, photography.
translation.zh: 也不该在那里放我们的车或摄影作品

translation.en: [Snoop] To come from nothing...
translation.zh: 他们一穷二白

translation.en: They ain't got no degrees. They learned this from the streets.
translation.zh: 他们没有学历 这些都是在街头学的

translation.en: [Haze] Are they responsible for bringing that style
translation.zh: 是他们把这种风格和文化

translation.en: and that culture to the forefront of the movement? Definitely.
translation.zh: 带到了艺术运动的前沿吗？ 那是肯定的

translation.en: Hip-hop culture owes so much to Toons and Estevan.
translation.zh: 卡通先生和埃斯特万 对嘻哈文化做出了卓越的贡献

translation.en: [Eminem] Them being so prominent in the culture
translation.zh: 他们在这一文化中的突出地位

translation.en: helped shape that wave
translation.zh: 帮助塑造了

translation.en: that even the generation after us, coming up...
translation.zh: 我们之后的新一代人物的兴盛浪潮

translation.en: [Brian] Where do Cartoon and Estevan lie in the greater scheme of art itself?
translation.zh: 放眼这一艺术 卡通先生和埃斯特万的地位如何？

translation.en: I think pretty high.
translation.zh: 我认为非常高

translation.en: [Roger] They're out there. They're approachable.
translation.zh: 他们很活跃又平易近人

translation.en: They're shooting for magazines. They're friends with people on Skid Row.
translation.zh: 他们帮杂志拍照 他们和贫民窟的人交朋友

translation.en: You've done a lot for me, brother.
translation.zh: 你们为我做了很多 兄弟

translation.en: They're friends with graffiti writers.
translation.zh: 他们结交了涂鸦画手

translation.en: [OG Slick] I'll show you what I think about H&M, you know?
translation.zh: 这就是我对H&M的态度 （操你妈的H&M）

translation.en: [Roger] They're friends with musicians, celebrities.
translation.zh: 他们和音乐人、明星是朋友

translation.en: [George] They're still doing it.
translation.zh: 他们仍在创作 而且比以往还要精彩

translation.en: They're doing it better than they ever have, and that's pride.
translation.zh: 他们仍在创作 而且比以往还要精彩 这就是自豪感

translation.en: That's heart. That's Chicano.
translation.zh: 这就是艺术 这就是奇卡诺

translation.en: [man] With all the racism, xenophobia that's going on right now in the US,
translation.zh: 种族主义和仇外情绪正在美国蔓延

translation.en: for Chicano art to just be pushed as hard as possible,
translation.zh: 能如此强力地推动 墨裔美国人的奇卡诺艺术

translation.en: whether it's a direct a political message or just as a style, is a great thing.
translation.zh: 不管是直接的政治抗议 还是一种艺术风格 这是很棒的事

translation.en: These ICE agents and these raids and the racism,
translation.zh: 考虑到移民及海关执法局人员 各种突袭和种族主义

translation.en: it's only gonna speak to our cultures.
translation.zh: 这只会在我们的文化中引起共鸣

translation.en: The culture has to be a little louder than the hate.
translation.zh: 文化必须比仇恨更响亮才行

translation.en: We're gonna keep moving forward, keep creating
translation.zh: 我会继续前进 继续创作并忠于这一文化

translation.en: and stay true to this culture.
translation.zh: 继续创作并忠于这一文化

translation.en: Thank you for coming! Thank you for coming.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们的到来！
